pa na ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang / lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas ma ga d+hA'i

rgyal po bzo sbyongs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis

dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas

pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du gshegs

su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das
cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu

zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na mu stegs yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes nas ring po ma lon par de

rnams kyi ston pa dus byas par gyur pa dang / de rnams kyi nang na nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis tshogs yongs su sdud pa dang / tshogs kyi 'dren par gyur pa gang yin pa de yongs su 'dren pa na de gnyis

kyis 'di ltar yu bu cag las gcig gis bdud rtsi sngar rnyed kyang de gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o zhes dam bca' ba byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs

te 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /

de'i tshe na kun du rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam

sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung

ba ji snyed lhags shing gnas pa dag las 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam 'di lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong gis ma la bdag de'i gan du song ste/ dge slong khyed kyi sten pa ni gang yin/ gang gi

phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dga' zhes dri'o snyam du rig nas lam po che rub pa zhig na 'gro ba dang ldog pas shas cher sdod cing 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul kun du rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas kun du

rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/ gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dga'/ tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i rigs las skra

dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba zhig yod do/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kho

bo'i ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no/ /kho bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo / /kho bo de'i chos la dga'o/ /dge slong de'i phyir chos ston cig /tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ni na gzhon pa dang / rab tu byung ba gsar pas de'i phyir kho bos

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par sla ba ma yin te/ 'on kyang 'di ltar de'i don bstan par bya'o/ /dge slong kho bo la

ni don dgos kyi tshig ni shin du mang pos kyang ci bya ste/ khyod kyis don mang yang rung nyung yang rung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung

ba dang / /de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa 'ang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to/ /de skad gsung pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ kun du rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la

chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring

mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba de logs su thal

mo sbyar ba btud te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du/ /sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa/ /'chi med mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs/ /

tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/ /de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par

bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la lan gsum bskor ba byas te song nas kun du rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ngo / /

kun du rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun du rgyu nye rgyal thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kun du rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rnam par dang / gzhin gyi mdog

ni yongs su dag lpags pa'i mdog ni yongs su dkar na khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rnyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos ston cig /de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/

chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / /de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to/ /de skad gsung pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /tshe dang ldan pa da dung yang lan cig rjod cig /

tshe dang ldan pa brjod par bya'o/ /chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / /zhes pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun du rgyu pang nas skyes chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing

dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas kun du rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rag pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring

mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ kun du rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba

btud de de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa/ /'chi med mya ngan med pa yi/ /go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs/ /tshe dang

ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa

spyad par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir ji 'khor la blta bar bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs pa yin no/ /de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang /

pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams shes par gyis shig /kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyod par byed na khyed cag ji ltar

byed/ mkhan po gnyis bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis las brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/ gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod

na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u rnams da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya

lnga bcu lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang /

pang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyod kyis grogs po'i tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ tshogs yongs su 'dren pa/ tshogs kyi mdun

nas 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong ngo / /'di gnyis ni nyan thos zung dang / zung gi mchog dang / zung bzang por gyur te/ gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu

'gyur la/ gcig shos ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ston pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa/ /skyes bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byon/ /

bcom ldan srid pa mthar mdzad pas/ /grogs po nye rgyal pang nas skyes/ /'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par/ /de ltar mchi ba gzigs gyur nas/ tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni/ /'di gnyis nga yi nyan thos kyi/ /zung

mchog 'gyur zhes des bstan te/ /gcig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog /gcig shos shes rab ldan pa yi/ /mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad/ /de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung

ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing dge

slong dag tshur shog /tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur to lag na lhung bzed thogs pa skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa

tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po

rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la

zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dag

mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/ /grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/ /yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/ /phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/ /des dge slong rnams dpa' gong zhing mi

dga' ba dang / mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyi dro bsod snyoms mi len pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas/

rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas

bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang chos gos dag thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod

snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lags pas/ yang dag rgyal ba'i kun

khri ngan/ phyin chad yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang / de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/ grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/ /yang dag

rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/ /phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/ /zhes mchi nas des bdag cag rnams dpa' gong zhing mi dga' ba dang / mi 'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal

po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad ces/ 'di la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag /dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de/ /de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la/ /mkhas pa su zhig mi bzod byed/ /ces brjod na rgyal po'i

khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am/ slobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te

rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi

dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/ /grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/ /yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/ /phyin chad ci zhig bkri

bar bya/ /de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di na dpa' chen bde gshegs dag /dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de/ /de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la/ /mkhas pa su zhig bzod mi byed/ /de skad

ces smras pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am/ spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi

tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas bdud

rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring ba rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung

bar gyur to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa 'char

kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal btad nas thugs mi bgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dga' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i

mi btang ba las de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes smra'o/ /de ni kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i mi gtang na dka' yang phrin yig khyer te mi 'ong na ji

ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchis te bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs

pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ /'char kas smras pa/ lha slar mchis lags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa/
lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/ khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te/ /nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/ /rgyal ba ljon shing la bsten na/ /de nyid khyod kyi slob ma yi/ /yal ga lcug ma 'phel 'gyur

bas/ gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan/ /gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na/ /bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te/ /bu gcig

yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyad pa thob gyur na/ /de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med/ /gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na/ /nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni/ /shin du che dang phan gdags zhes/ /khyod
kyis dam bcas mdzad pas na/ /khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyes na/ /bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la/ /thugs brtses rjes su gzung mdzod de/ /gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ /zhes spring ba'i yi ge

mchar kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba'i yi ge lags so/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas klags so/ /klags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang / 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ser skya'i gzhir

mi bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka 'dong ngo / /'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud

dang bdag gi mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing / /sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas

spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing / /sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/ /gzhi

med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing / /'jig rten ma bcom chung zad yod min pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /

lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rig par bgyi'o/ /'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no/ /'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba

zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung shig /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung la

ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang / yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyis chos dang
'thun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog pas/ 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/

shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu byung ste/

bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas kun du spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/ 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba dag go/ /btsun pa bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka song la khyod mod kho nar rgyal po'i

khab tu ma 'jug par sgo la sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te nang du spyon cig zer na 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na/ yod do

zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par
mi bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes 'dri na/ mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na/ dgon pa 'am/

gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri
na/ byon no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /ji srid cig na byon zhes 'dri na/ zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
song shig sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te/ /lha rnams bsams pas 'grub 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyi/ /sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char

ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir song ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa drag po skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan

dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do/ /de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so/ /

rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thong shig /de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung ngam/ lha rab tu byung ngo / /khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras

pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu phyung mod kyi bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal pos

yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de'i don du chur btsags pa dang / 'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang /

dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho gas yongs su longs spyod do/ /rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/ 'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba

yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so/ /dper ji lta bu ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no/ /rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no/ /nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no/ /nam

mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad kyang 'di 'dra'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang brgyal

nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar phyung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha byon no/ /dus ji tsam na dgung bdun lon na'o/ /rgyal po

zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis/ rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor byos shig /'char kas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi

mdzad do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu

rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang

phran drug bcu brtsig tu chug shig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /

khang phran drug bcu brtsig tu bcug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ maud gal gyi bu song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te

yab sras gdan 'dzom na/ khyod cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas

dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'dzom na/ khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral

ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor

ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba

lta bu/ dpa' bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'dron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor

los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul

bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thang bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin

sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po

rnams shin du dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku

nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen

po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang

gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang gyo mo dang / gseg ma rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin du zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po spyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ta ka nas gang

yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar gyi lam shin du mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go/ /de nas 'bab chu ro hi ta ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed do/ /kha cig

ni so shing 'dor bar byed do/ /kha cig ni khrus byed do/ /ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya

mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na shAkya'i nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas ltog po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lta

brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te des de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas nga zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge

'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar

po dang / dkar po dang / len rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go/ /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad de/ sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/

sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang / nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/

rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa de bsdus te ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lnga

'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na

ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong

rnams sa la'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na ngur

smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na de la gzhon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags so/ /srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug

'dren pa lags/ /'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed don ni kun du ston mdzad lags/ /'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ /dri med btsal ba chos kyi dbang

phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang de gzigs shig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum

phyag bgyis te/ /bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang / /'dzam bu'i grib mas sku las ma 'das pa'o/ /de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthong nas de ltar yab sras

kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci'i tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub

pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshe na gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa na sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na

'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar

gyur nas sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa

lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so/ /gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhing las kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas

'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te

bzhugs pa na/ shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar

rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so/ /de bas na 'di skad ces/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la

'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltam pa'i tshe na sa 'di g.yos pa dang / /'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par

'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas bcom
ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las/ /yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las/ /dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnams su/ /ji lta bur ni 'ba'
zhig bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang du ni/ /khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba/ /'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus/ /thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ ba so
gser gyi rtsa ba can/ /shin du bde ba bting ba yi/ /khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las/ /gding ba la ni ji ltar mnal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni/ /dga' ba byang

chub yan lag gi/ me tog bkram par chags med cing / /yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na/ /glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa/ /tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la/ /

zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang / /yang dag rtsol ba'i gzhol ba yis/ /sa kun rnam par rgyu na yang / /nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med/ /
rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i/ /na bza' mnabs nas mdzes pa las/ /ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos banabs pa/ /ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes/ /nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te/ /de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams/ /nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa nas/ /du ma'i ro ldan

'bras chan gsol ba las/ /'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni/ /phal pa gsol ba ji ltar mgul du mchi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi srid pa thams cad spangs nas ni/ /nges par byung dang

mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i/ /nga yi chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi/ /'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir spyod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/ /rgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol

na/ /rnyog pa can la dri nga ba'i/ /chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na/ /bdag la 'thung ba thams cad ni/ dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa/ /chab kyi ro mchog nga 'thung ngo / /

rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang / /khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs/ /da ltar gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa/ /blo bzangs ji ltar bsnyengs

pa med par bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa/ /dri ma bag chags bcas par yang spangs pas/ /nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te/ /nga la 'di na 'jigs pa chung

zad med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ khyod sngon khrus khang shin du yid 'ong bar/ /khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na/ /gcig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/ /thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam chos kyi mtsho phran dri med pa/ /tshul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /de la reg pa'i yon tan mi bkru na/ /lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/ /rgyal po zas

gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni/ /gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ /rnyog pa can la dri nga ba/ /chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa

med/ /bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus na/ /lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yis/ /tsan dan gyis ni sku bkrus

shing / /ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa las/ /de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin te/ /tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin/ /gser dang nor bu rna cha dag /

rmongs skyes nga la ci zhig bya/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod/ /gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye/ /yid 'byung ba yang ga las skye/ /zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ gang gis nga ni khyod gsod dang / /gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang / /gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag /nyon mongs khyod la bshad par bya/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste/ /gal te 'di gsum yod min na/ /nga yang shin du

yid 'ong ba'i/ /yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba/ /legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs/ /khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/ /ji lta bur yang ma gos so/ /

de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni/ /thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ /bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag

gi bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa na bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang

'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so/ /lha sbyin nga rgyal las nga rgyal can sdig pa

'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas khro bas kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed pa shes na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig /de la shAkya

rnams kyis gshe ba'i tshig gis smras pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa

mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/ /ro hi ta ka'i bskyed

mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang

lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/ /'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa

thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste 'khor de dag phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge

'dun la bab par bkod do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang mngon du smra bar gyur na/ da lta ni mis mchod kyis

lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyi/ /char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de/ /mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /drongs te
thar pa'i lam la sbyor bar mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' shig /'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin

no snyam ste lhag par dga' ba las gyur kyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go/ /rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang shin du dga' ba'o/ /de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin du dga'

ba yod kyis ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang shin du dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la soms

shig btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po

rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/ maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi

bu chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ rang gi stan

las mi snang bar gyur te shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang

snyoms par 'jug par byed de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po

dang dkar po dang / len rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go/ /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed do/ /lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ /lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed la

lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho

'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba sdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo+od gal

gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dag gsum rig dang / sems

kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / /zag zad dgra bcom gang yin pa/ /thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de 'di ltar rdzu

'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas de shin du dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs

pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na/ lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do/ /snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog spur

rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen

po rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po

brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la sgo ba/

bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig /ko+o shi ka khyod kyi gsung mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo

thams cad pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te n+ya grog d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to/ /de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhi na 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags

skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar sgo na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub 'khor dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nub phyogs

na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba

der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po

che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po

zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /bzhin bzangs khyod su

zhig rgyal po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/

bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes po'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po

zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /mig mi bzang gis

smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo / /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi

bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das

lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de bdag gis blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas

gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod

kyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa

med par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / bag nyal ba

dang khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes

bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag la phas ma bgyis mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi

'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pa dang / rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/

rus pa'i ri bo las ni sgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag go/ /yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan gdags pa/ /dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang / /khyod kyis

bdag la mdzad lags te/ /sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis/ /khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/ /drangs te mtho ris thar pa las/ /bsgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te/ /khyod kyis dga' ba mdzad pa legs/ /mgon

po byams pa khyed kyis ni/ /bdag gi tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar/ /mtho ris rnyed pa srid pa yi/ /longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na

ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar

mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos

phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig /ci'i slad du/ ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

sngar bden pa mthong bas so/ /gang gi gdugs la lags/ de ring kho na'o/ /bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong

lags so/ /de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya drug khri drug stong dang bden

pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa

mthong lags so/ /gal te de ltar gyur na nga su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag /de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas

rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol
pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' dang sham thabs banabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs

kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas

gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'

ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad pa/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis/ /shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi/ /yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni/ /rtag pa'i gnas ni

thob par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na

bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/ nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis

ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na dka' thub drag pa'i brtul shugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du

sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/ lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las des bsams pa shAkya'i 'khor gyis

yin no snyam nas/ de nas shAkya thams cad bsogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'gyur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/

g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ rab tu byung shig /ci thams cad dam/ khyim re nas re re'o/ /

bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim re nas/ re re rab tu byung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/ /

bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang ming chen no/ /ming chen ni zhing blas kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no/ /ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed dga'

dgur spyod par byed do/ /ming chen la mas smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu phyung shig ces bsgos khyod rab tu byung shig /des smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis/

khyod kyi bu sdug pa dang bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung shig /bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig /yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen

po can lags mod/ de ring la cung zad kyang ma bskur dang / ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro/ /bu de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o/ /des gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas kha

ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skegs la rgyas btab nas/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri ba dang / ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig /des de khyer nas song ba dang / lha

rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des bsams pa/ rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya/ de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des

rdze'u de rnams sran tshod dang / tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa'i zas kyis bkang ngo / /ji tsam na mngag gzhug mas der khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang / des smras pa/ bu mo 'o ni na ci yod/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci yang

ma mchis so/ /ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci ste bskur gdon mi za bar 'di ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re shig blta'o zhes ji tsam na kha phye ba dang / bskyed mos tshal de

thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/ de snams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so/ /de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas spring ba/ yum gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin zhes

bgyi ba 'di lta bu bskur ba'i rigs so/ /des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/ /des ming chen la bstan nas bu mthong ngam/ yum mthong lags so/ /khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po'i

sems can mi'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/ des smras pa/ yum de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung / mi ldan yang rung / bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes ji

ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu 'byung bar khas len du ma btub bo/ /de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs tu bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na/

khyod ci rab tu byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'dug /des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nye dmigs ci mchis/ khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu byung bas legs
par bsgrubs na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyim par 'dug ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi 'thob bo/ /ma bskyangs na sems can

dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas 'thob bo/ /yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / rab tu 'byung ngo / /

des smras pa/ bu legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo / /de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi bang len te/ pi bang len pa na rgyun chad nas sgra

gzhan du gyur to/ /ma 'gags pa pi bang la byang ba yin pas des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas sgor bsdad de/ /sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal

mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig /sgo srungs song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/ lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /des
smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog /shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong shig /de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste smras pa/ khyod 'ongs nas ci srid lon/

des smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyod pi bang len pa na rgyun chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so/ /de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ des smras pa/ khyod pi bang len pa la byang ba yin no/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan

gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig par bsgo bas da khyod kyis

mkhyen par mdzod cig /rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob shig /de de nyid du gnas btab bo/ /mal 'cha' bas rims bag gi dri

can gyi gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang / de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su myong nas smras pa/ ci 'di'i 'og tu rdo phre'u yod dam/ de rnams kyis

brtag pa brtsams pa na me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /ma 'gags pa mtshan mo mi bde zhing nyal nas nam langs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ma 'gags pa ci ga bde bar gnyid log gam/

des smras pa lha bde bar gnyid ma log go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir ma 'gags pas smras pa/ /lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus snang lags so/ /rgyal pos mal 'cha'
ba bkug nas khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste ci bya/ mal 'cha' bas smras pa/ lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so/ /rgyal pos dkor pa bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis rims bag

gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya/ des smras pa/ lha bdag la tha ga pas gtad pa lags so/ /rgyal pos tha ga pa bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos 'bul/ tha ga pas smras pa/ lha

snam bu 'thag pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na/ bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri

lags so/ /rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu gal te kho bo

rab tu byung na/ lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur te/ de shAkya rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la lha sbyin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan
gyis de bkug ste de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/ lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na/ khyod ci byed/ lha sbyin gyis bsams pa/ gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / shAkya'i
rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu byung bar mi 'gyur gyis de la thabs zhig bsham par bya ste bslu'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul
bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa/ ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas smras pa/ khyed cag rab tu
'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyis dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal pos tshig de

glegs bu la bris nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga brgya

rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba skyed cig ces bsgo'o/ /lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung

bar shes par gyur dang bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig /de ni gal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam/ ci rab tu byung la

bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas des grong khyer de gseg ma dang gyo mo bsal/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/

gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan bsgreng / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po spyangs/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag /me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du bcug go/ /de nas shAkya brgya stong du mas yongs su

bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo na seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/ /shAkya mo dang / shAkya gzhon nu ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung khol ma can dang / skar khung dang / stegs bu dag la 'dug go/ /shAkya rnams kyi 'byor pa la lta
bar 'dod pa'i skyes pa'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su 'dug go/ /shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/ su dag

gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur brtag pa'i bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan dag bkug go/ /shAkya rnams do shal dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang / ma dag la bltas nas/

so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ ri shig 'dis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de

bzhin du nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba na/ de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas lha sbyin phyir byung ste/ de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan

mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /ko ka li ka dang / khan dra drab bya dang / ka ta mo ra ka dang / rgyal dang /

rgya mtshos sbyin rnams phyir byung ba na/ bong bu'i skad grag nas de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /nye dga'

glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang / de glang po che las babs te blangs so/ /de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba

rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams bskyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan

'das gang na ba der dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung na kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed
par mi 'gyur te/ mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma pa yin pas/ ma la ngas thams cad dge

slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsol ba dang bzhi'i las

kyis rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyen to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye
bar 'khor zhes bya ba/ de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na skra 'breg par btang nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'breg pa na/ de ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag cing skad 'dzer cing dbugs brtsegs

pas skra 'dreg par byed do/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir du/ de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dal bus tshig re re nas smras pa/ lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo
rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa mi phal ba rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig /khyed kyis spangs te gson pa bas na gum mi bsngo'o/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/

nye bar 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig /ngas ji ltar mi phal che ba rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas des
phyogs gcig tu ras gcig bting nas shAkya'i gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig /'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi

gnas kyis rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog shig /de rnams kyi se mo do dang / do shal dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i

rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so/ /nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams kyi mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang / des bsams pa/ re shig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs

dang 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu byung na bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /

gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo la rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson

par bya ba zhig snyam mo/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams

kyang byed pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin du mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug /nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu

'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la bang mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug

bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal

ba dang / 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying por

byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin/ rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin

gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/ /rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad/ /'das nas yun ring lon pa yi/ /las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad/ /gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs

pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshur bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /des khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor khrid de bcom

ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba

la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags na thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog /tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang skra dang

kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i

lus ldan zhing / mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /shAkya rab tu byung ba'i rnams ni rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byed pas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan

'dud par byed pa na nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so/ /de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang gdud par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rgan gyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa chog la thud cig /des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos

rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho
phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te/ de ltar thams cad kyis rims bzhin du gtugs so/ /lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga

rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis thud cig /des gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes te 'dud du ma btub ste der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lhas sbyin gyis

bcag go/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag

gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni

gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi

rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don de nyid zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung
bar bya'o/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug

go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'dir bdag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du 'tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi bka'

mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste

shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog

ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan
'das la don 'di nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/ bcom

ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/ thog ma ni gang lags/ rgyu ni ci zhig lags/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas

shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs na/ mu stegs can dang / kun du rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge slong gau ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung ston pas bdag nyid bstod par byed do

zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod pas nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs par nus pa su yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'khor

de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu nga rgyab snyung bas re shig de bsal gyis khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs

rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe

dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas snam sbyar bltab ste sngas su bcug nas/ glo g.yas pas phab ste/ zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran

pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na shAkya rnams

gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa

maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya

rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs

te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ gau ta ma dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig rten zhig

nas/ sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyam shing ma tshang ba med pa yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang

ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' shig du 'gyur zhing mtsho gcig tu

'gyur ro/ /sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' shig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do/ /dper na 'o ma bskol ba grangs bar gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma

chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs pa de bzhin du sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gis mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gi pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do/ /sa'i bcud de ni la kha dog

phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na mar sar lta bu'o/ /ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod
do/ /gau ta ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags shing 'jig rten chags na/ de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad las zad bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams

dang skal ba mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas

pa rang gi 'od can/ mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang med/ skad cig dang thang cig

dang yud tsam yang med/ mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang med/ zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do/ /skyes pa dang bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi gzhan du na sems can sems can

zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar

kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la/ ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim

gyis za ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de rnams kyis kyang 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /

gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe/ de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs par gyur to/ /de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par

gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam dang /

mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las zas la ches nyung

zad tu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog

rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no/ /khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i
