pa dge slong gi 'bras bu bzhi las 'bras bu gang yang rung ba zhig 'thob bam/ bdag ni skye ba'i chos can te/ skye ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa/ rga ba'i chos can na ba'i chos can 'chi ba'i chos can te/ bdag ni 'dod pa dang

sdug pa dang phangs pa dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang 'bye ba dang / med pa dang bral ba dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba'o/ /bdag ni las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi skye gnas dang las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa las brtan par bya ba

ste/ las dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba gang dang gang byed pa las de dang de nyid kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro snyam du gnas 'di rab tu byung bas yang dang yang du so sor brtag par bya'o/ /gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag la yang dang yang du so

sor rtog pa de'i dge sbyong gi 'du shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong gi 'du shes yongs su rdzogs na 'du shes bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rtag par rgyun du byed pa dang rgyun du 'jug pa dang brnab

sems dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams de'i ched dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag sems dang yid dang rnam

par shes pa gang yun ring por gzugs la chags pa dang sgra la chags pa dang dri la chags pa dang ro la chags pa dang reg bya la chags pa dang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dag gis kun du bsags pa/ nye bar bsags pa de

ni so sor brtags pas 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba'i dbyings la nye bar rnam par gzhag pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag so so'i skye bos rnam pa nyi shus sems skyo bar bya ste/ bdag ni rtogs pas gsog yin no/ /
ma dul bar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yang sar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs mi shes pa'o/ /las mi shes pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin ma

thob pa'o/ /yang srid pa ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni rnyed dka' ba'o/ /'dod pa gsod par byed pas rtag tu rjes su bcings pa'o/ /bdag ni 'gro ba las ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag ni ngan song dag las

yongs su ma grol ba'o/ /bdag ni lta bar gyur pa dpag tu med pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /bdag ni mtshams med pa'i las rnams mi bya ba'i phyir gegs ma byas pa'o/ /bdag ni skye ba'i 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma

med pa'i mthar ma byas pa'o/ /mthar ma byas na byed pa gzhan med do/ /ma byas na bde ba'i ngo bo med do/ /las byas pa rnams ni chud za ba med do/ /bdag ni ma rig par gyur cing mi mkhas la 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur

ro zhes so so'i skye bos sems skyo bar bya'o/ /de rnam pa nyi shu po de rnams kyis sems skyo shin du skyo/ skrag shin du skrag bkag shin du bkag na/ rnam pa gzhan nyi shus sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas te/

de sems kyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so/ /de sems bla na med pa 'am/ sems rtse gcig pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma 'am/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'am/

ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma 'am/ rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma 'am/ spyod yul ma yin pa spong ba 'am/ spyod yul la gus pa 'am/ mdor

bstan pa 'am/ dmigs kyis bsal ba 'am/ kun du skyo ba mang ba 'am/ bla ma la rten pa 'am/ yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yid la byed pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so/ /de dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa

sgom pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so/ /de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar yang dag par tshul bzhin

yid la byas pa'i bdag nyid kyi bar du gcod pa ni bcu gcig tu rig par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dang yang du tshogs par 'du ba dang / zas la gdu ba nyid dang las la dga' ba nyid dang smra ba la dga' ba nyid dang 'du 'dzi'i gtam la

dga' ba nyid dang 'du 'dzi la dga' ba nyid dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / 'phyar ba dang bag med pa dang yul du mi gnas pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag bar du gcod pa ma bcom pa de dag yang dag par 'joms pa mkhas pa bcu la

bslab par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba la mkhas pa dang rab tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa dang / btang snyoms la mkhas pa dang /

skye mched la mkhas pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa la mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po bcu gsum skye ba
na skye ste/ dad pa can de ston pa'am chos sam dge 'dun nam bdag gi tshul khrims sam gzhan gyi tshul khrims sam/ bdag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos rnams sam bdag gi rtogs pa 'am/ gzhan gyi rtogs pa

yid la byed pa na mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po sel ba'o zhes mchog tu dga' ba skye ba 'di ni dad pa can

gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi bde ba'i chos mang po sgrub pa'o zhes mchog tu dga' ba skye ba 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das de

bdag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma sel ba'o zhes mchog tu dga' ba skye ba 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma sgrub pa'o zhes

mchog tu dga' ba skye ba 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos chos bzhi la brten na chos lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'dun pa dang

brtson 'grus dang dben pa dang phyir mi zlog pa'o/ /chos lnga po gang dag bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ mchog tu dga' ba dang dga' ba dang shin du sbyangs pa dang bde ba dang ting nge 'dzin to/ /tshe dang ldan pa

dag de chos lnga po de dag kun du bsags shing nye bar bsags na zug rngu brgyad med par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dang zhe sdang gi zug rngu dang gti mug gi zug rngu dang nga rgyal gyi zug rngu dang sred pa'i zug

rngu dang lta ba'i zug rngu dang the tshom dang som nyi'i zug rngu'o/ /zug rngu brgyad po de dag med par gyur na mi slob pa'i chos bcu thob par 'gyur te/ mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i

ngag dang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang yang dag pa'i ye shes so/ /mi

slob pa'i chos bcu po de dag skyes shing thob ste ldan na 'phags pa yan lag lnga spangs pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa bsrung ba gcig pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ so so'i bden pa bsal ba/ bsal ba spangs pa/ kun du

rtog pa'i rnyog pa med// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ad b+hu ta d+harma par+yA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe

chos gos dang sham thabs bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs

shig na khang pa brtsegs pa sgo brgyad bcu yod la/ byug pas byugs pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba dar gyi lda ldi mang po spyangs pa zhig mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu

mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu byas te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan

las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la/ khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru

tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de gnyis las bsod nams shin du che ba gang yin snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur gyis/

bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms blangs te/

zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms kyi zas phyi ma spangs te/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag nas rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag

'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag 'dir snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs

bgos lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi slad du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs shig na khang pa brtsegs pa chab sgo brgyad bcu

mchis la byug pas byugs pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba/ dar gyi lda ldi mang po spyangs pa dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig
gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu bgyis te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i

mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam bgyis la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs bgyis la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring
bsrel stsal na de gnyis bsod nams shin du che ba gang lags snyam mo/ /bdag gis yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur
gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung bar bgyi snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag don 'di nyid zhu lags na thugs brtse

ba nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la don 'di nyid legs par bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo

khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs nas lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid 'dri bar sems pa ni/

legs so legs so/ /kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling gi gling ni chur dpag tshad bdun stong / rgyar yang dpag tshad bdun stong / byang du ni kha tshon che

ba/ lhor ni sogs kar 'dug pa de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams

dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das

pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel

bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta zhog gi/ kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling yod de chur ni dpag tshad brgyad stong / rgyar yang dpag

tshad brgyad stong ste/ kun nas zla gam lta bur grub pa de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi

'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan

las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi

ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta 'ang zhog /shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta 'ang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling yod de

chur ni dpag tshad dgu stong / zheng yang dpag tshad dgu stong ste/ kun nas zla ba nya ba lta bu grub pa de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang

lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku

gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta 'ang zhog /shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta 'ang zhog /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi

gling lta 'ang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bya ba'i gling yod de/ chur ni dpag tshad khri/ rgyar yang dpag tshad khri ste/ kun nas gru bzhi lham par grub pa de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la

zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge

'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing

btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta 'ang

zhog /shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta 'ang zhog /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta 'ang zhog /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta yang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba yod de/

de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang

sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru

ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams

che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta yang zhog /shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta yang zhog /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta yang zhog /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta yang zhog /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi

khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba lta yang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang

bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma

tsam gyi gdugs byas nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni
ye shes kyis dpag tu med pa/ tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa/ bzod pas dpag tu med pa/ brtson 'grus kyis dpag tu med pa/ bsam gtan gyis dpag tu med pa/ shes rab kyis dpag tu med pa/
byams pas dpag tu med pa/ snying rjes dpag tu med pa/ dga' bas dpag tu med pa/ btang snyoms kyis dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa

bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma 'dres pa gsum dang snying rje chen pos dpag tu med pa ste/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon
tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes bya bar zung shig /de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad

ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan

po 'dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta pra ti bim+ba pra tiSh+ThA a nu shai sA sam+ba dan ti nA ma d+harma

par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig rim gro'i gnas su lhags te 'dug nas
bar skabs der gtam 'di lta bu zhig glengs so/ /khyed cag la bram ze 'am/ khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ dge ba ji ltar bya zhes tshol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs

brnyan bgyid par spro ba skyed pa dag snang la de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du lhags nas btsun pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig

par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig yod pa bdag cag gis mi shes te/ de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang 'thun par lan gdab par bya/ gang
don 'di dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la

bdag cag gis zhu'o/ /'on tang bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher phye ste lan gdab par bya'o zhes bgros

so/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong rab tu

mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag rim gro'i gnas der lhags te 'dus pa dang / bar der bka' mchid 'di lta bu zhig glengs te/ khyed cag
la bram ze 'am/ khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ dge ba ji ltar bgyi zhes tshol ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi bar spro ba skyes pa dag gda' la/ de dag gal te
bdag cag gi drung du mchis nas/ btsun pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis pa bdag cag gis ma mtshal na/ de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang 'thun par lan gdab par bgyi/ gang don de dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu bar bgyi'o/ /'on tang

bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher phye ste lan gdab par bgyi'o snyam bgyid do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das don de dag nyid bdag cag zhu zhing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/

dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang snying brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhus te/ khyed gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas la don de nyid zhu bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /dge slong / dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i

gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon 'di lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ gzhal med khang chen por gnas pa dang / bong steng bzang por grags pa dang / spro ba mang ba dang tshe ring ba dang grags pa dang ldan pa dang / bde ba mang ba ste/

dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon dang po yin no/ /gzhan yang phyug po dang nor mang ba dang longs spyod che ba dang / nor rdzas dang / yo byad mang ba dang bdag dbang

ba bdag gir bya ba mang ba dang / nor dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser dang mdzod dang bang ba'i tshogs mang ba dang rta dang glang po che dang ba lang dang lug dang bran dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba dang blon po dang mdza'

bshes dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams mang por 'gyur te/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no/ /dge slong dag gzhan yang

gzugs bzang po dang / blta na sdug pa dang / mdzes pa dang mdog gser ltar bzang ba dang / mgo gdugs ltar zlum pa dang lag pa ring ba dang dpral ba dbyes che ba dang / smin mtshams bar ma chad pa dang yan lag

dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang rgyan thams cad gyis brgyan par 'gyur te/ dge slong dag 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gsum pa yin no/ /dge slong

dag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor bzang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang / bu stong gis bskor bar 'gyur te/ de'i bu 'am chung ma 'am/ bran nam nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad de la gus par

nyan pa dang / bka' nyan par byed de/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/ /dge slong dag gzhan yang de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris

kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ der skyes nas lha'i rgyal po khyad par can lha dang / lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyi rten du 'gyur la/ gnas bcu po lha'i tshe dang lha'i mdog dang lha'i stobs dang lha'i bde

ba dang / lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dang / lha'i gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i
phan yon lnga pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhu
chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ / tsai t+ya pa dak+Shi Na gA thA/ bod skad du/ mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab

blo ldan 'jig rten na/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba/ /shes rab chen po shA ri'i bus/ /ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus/ /mchod rten bskor ba bgyis pa yis/ /rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur ba/ /skal ba chen po'i
'jig rten mchog /rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /ston pas de la bka' stsal pa/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pa yi/ /yon tan gang yin phyogs tsam bstan/ /

mchod rten bskor ba byas pa yis/ /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / /lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye che rnams mchod byed 'gyur/ /dal ba rnyed dka' thob gyur nas/ /skad cig gcig tsam bar du yang / /mchod rten

bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mi khom brgyad rnams spong bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing 'dzangs pa dang / /thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba

byas pas ni/ /lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyis/ /tshe ring ba yang de yis 'thob/ /grags pa chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'dzam bu'i gling du rus kyi mchog /cho rigs yongs su dag par yang / /

blo ldan de ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /kha bzhin dag kyang bzang ba dang / /mdog sdug pa dang mkhas pa dang / /bde bar gnas pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang / /

ser sna med cing gtong phod dang / /sbyin pa dag la dpa' bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug /mdog bzang mthong na dga' ba dang / /longs spyod rgya chen spyod par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'du byed

stong par mthong nas kyang / /de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur/ /myur du dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /rgyal rigs mchog tu skye bar 'gyur/ /bu smad 'khor dang ldan pa dang / /stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan par 'gyur/ /

mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bram ze che zhing mtho bar skye/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing thos dang ldan/ /rig byed gsang sngags ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho bar skye/ /phyug cing nor yang mang ba

dang / /nor dang 'bru rnams ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mnga' bdag rje/ /sa steng mtha' dag dbang byed pa'i/ /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /rin chen

bdun dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /chos bzhin 'khor lo skor bar byed/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'di nas 'phos nas mtho ris 'gro/ /sangs rgyas bstan la dga' ba dang / /rnal 'byor ldan zhing rdzu

'phrul che/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /lha yul dag nas 'phos nas kyang / /de ni mi yi nang du skye/ /rmongs pa med par mngal du 'jug /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mngal gyi skyon gyi dri ma yis/ /de la gos par mi 'gyur te/ /

de ni nor bu dag pa bzhin/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /ma ltor bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /de ni bde bar btsa' ba dang / /bde bar nu zho 'thung bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /phas kyang g.yog 'khor mang

po yis/ /de la gso zhing gnas par 'gyur/ /ma mas rtag tu rim gro byed/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /nye du rnams kyi snying du sdug /de bzhin pha ma lhag par byams/ /skyes nas longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /mchod

rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /sha za dang ni srin rnams kyis/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur te/ /longs spyod dag la skyon med spyod/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang de dag rnams/ /zhar ba grum por yong mi 'gyur/

lus kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mig kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /dkyus ring mthon mthing sdug pa dang / /lha yi mig kyang de yis 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /lus bde sems

kyang brtan pa dang / /de bzhin brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / /dpung mgo zlum zhing brtan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /stobs dang byad gzugs phun sum tshogs/ /yan lag thams cad mtshan rnams kyis/ /legs par

brgyan cing ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang phyug rje/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i brgya byin du/ /lha yi dbang po chen por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'thab bral lha yi rgyal po dang /

de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan dang / /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa yi/ /dbang phyug nyid du de 'gyur zhing / /lha rnams bye ba snyed kyis mchod/ /mchod rten

bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa bye ba stong dag dang / /khrag khrig phrag brgya dag tu yang / /shes rab ldan pa rtag tu mchod/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu/ /lus gtsang gos kyang gtsang ba dang / /dkar

po'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs/ /de ni le lo med pa dang / /shin du bsgrub pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /brtson 'grus brtan zhing

mthu yang brtan/ /rtsal brtan cis kyang mi tshugs shing / /don rnams myur du 'grub par byed/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /gdangs snyan gsang yang mtho ba dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro can/ /gnod pa med cing nad med 'gyur/ /mchod rten

bskor ba byas pas ni/ /nga nyid kyis ni bstan pa yi/ /gnas der myur du de 'gro zhing / /shas cher skye ba thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /sems kyi tshad med bzhi po dang / /rdzu 'phrul

rkang pa'i dbang yang 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang / /dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / /byang chub yan lag 'bras bu 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mngon shes

drug ldan zag pa med/ /nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi/ /dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'dod chags zhe sdang spangs pa dang / /'khor rnams thams cad spangs pa yi/ /rang rgyal

byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs/ /mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang / /gser gyi sku mdog 'thob par 'gyur/ /lus kyi las kyang bskor ba yin/ /ngag gi

las kyang bskor ba yin/ /yid kyi las kyang bskor ba yin/ /smon lam btab pa 'ang bskor ba yin/ /'dir ni bskor ba byas pa yis/ /bgrod dka' bde dgur don rnams 'grub/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la/ /bskor ba

byas pa'i yon tan gang / /de ni tshig tsam nyi tshe yis/ /legs par bstan par mi nus so/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /shA ri'i bus ni zhus nas kyang / /mchod rten phyag byas yon tan gang / /'jig rten mgon pos bstan

pa yin/ /rta brgya dang ni gser srang brgya/ /drel mo'i shing rta brgya dag dang / /rgod ma brgya yi shing rta rnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs bkang ba yang / /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /kam po dzi

yi bu mo brgya/ /nor bu rna cha gdub 'khor thogs/ /gser gyi dpung rgyan 'chang ba dang / /mgrin pa gser gyis legs brgyan pa/ /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /gangs kyi glang chen brgya

rten dag /lus chen nam tshong yangs pa dang / /sna yang gshol mda' 'dra ba'i glang / /gser dang nor bus brgyan pa dang / /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i

sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser srang 'bum grangs snyed/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis 'jim gong gcig bor ba/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung

gser gyi pho brang 'bum/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog sil ma spungs/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser snod 'bum bzhag pa/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod

ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba thogs/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser khal bye ba gnyis/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/

dga' ba'i sems kyis spos chus dbang bskur ba/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser gyi phung po 'bum/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis mar me 'bul

byed pa/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser srang bye ba 'bum/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs thogs/ /gser gyi ri bo

lhun po tshad 'bum yang / /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /'di ni dpag med de bzhin gshegs/ /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ded dpon bla na med pa la/ /phul ba'i phan yon bstan pa yin/ /bzhugs pa'i tshe na gang gis

mchod/ /mya ngan 'das 'og gang gis mchod/ /sems dge ba ni mtshungs 'gyur na/ /bsod nams la ni khyad par med/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la dad rnams kyis/ /rnam par sman pa 'ang

bsam mi khyab/ /mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ pra se na dzi ta gA thA/ bod skad du/ gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal gdugs dang cod pan

dang / /rnga yab ral gri nor bu lham bzhag ste/ /thal mo sbyar te legs par phyag 'tshal nas/ /'jig rten mgon po la ni zhu ba zhus/ /phan par dgongs pa thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mya ngan 'das pa na/ /mchod pa

bgyis pas blo mchog ji lta bur/ /srid pa gzhan du mi rnams bde ba 'thob/ /bcom ldan mi yi seng ge snga phyi'i mtha'i/ /chos rnams kun la mngon sum spyad gyur pas/ /kun dga' bzang po yi ni mngon sum du/ /gsal rgyal zhus lan 'di dag

bka' stsal pa/ /ji ltar rgyal ba dag la mi rnams kyis/ /mchod pa byas pas srid pa gzhan dag tu/ /rnam smin 'dod pa sna tshogs ci thob pa/ /zhus pa'i don de rgyal pos mnyan par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten rnams dang

ni/ /sku gzugs rnams la rdul phran ci song ba/ /de yi grangs snyed de byed mi rnams kyis/ /lha yul sa stengs nges par rgyal srid 'thob/ /gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong

nas/ /tha mar skye dang rga la sogs pa yi/ /sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob/ /su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs byed pa/ /de dag gzugs bzang yid 'ong yon tan ldan/ /dbang po bsdams shing 'od 'bar nyi ma bzhin/ /'jig

rten dag na mig tu sdug par 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa/ /de yi lus ni dri ma med pa dang / /pad ma'i snying po lta bur 'jam zhing yangs/ /nad dang mya ngan sdug bsngal 'jigs las thar/ /su zhig 'jig rten mgon

po'i gzugs byed pa/ /bran du mi skye mngag gzhug skye mi 'gyur/ /dbul bor mi 'gyur rigs dman mi 'gyur zhing / /dbang po rnams kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni/ /mya ngan yongs med lus

kun brtan pa dang / /longs spyod mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan/ /dgra yi tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten srog shing phul ba yis/ /chos dang rjes 'thun chos la sgrub pa dang / /tshul khrims thos dang

bzod pa'i mchog dang ldan/ /'jig rten dag na don kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod rten mchog la gdugs brtsegs phul ba yis/ /lha dang mi yi nang na skye ba dang / /sred med bu yi lus 'dra lus kun brtan/ /bkur sti bya ba'i yon tan ldan par

'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten rdo thal byugs pa yis/ /lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na tshe ring zhing / /lus sems nad dang mya ngan byed spangs te/ /rtag tu skyid cing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur/ /gser dngul spa ba'i glegs mas g.yogs pa yi/ /

thub pa'i dbang po'i mchod rten byas pa yis/ /mi rnams srid pa'i khyad par gzhan dag tu/ /lus mkhregs 'od kyang 'bar zhing mdzes par 'gyur/ /su dag la la mchod rten sku gzugs la/ /dad pa'i sems kyis bla re 'bul byed pa/ /de dag

sa steng rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa/ /ma lus gnod med rgyal gcig dbang byed 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchod rten dag la dga' bzhin du/ /rnam mang rgya chen gdugs ni btags pa yis/ /lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na gdugs 'dra bar/ /lha

dang mi yi dbang po lta bur 'gyur/ /mi rnams su dag sku gdung snying po can/ /dri med bsod nams 'byung gnas gyur pa la/ /ba dan mdzes pa sna tshogs 'dogs pa dag /mthu dang ldan zhing srid gsum mchod gnas 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchod

rten cod pan btags pa yis/ /mi dbang dpal dang lha dbang dpal thob cing / /bde ba'i mchog kyang nyams su myong gyur nas/ /rnam par grol ba'i cod pan khyad par 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la dril phul bas/ /tshig btsan grags pa

chen po dag dang ldan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong skye ba dran/ /de dag gis ni rgyan rnams sna tshogs 'thob/ /mkhas pa su dag bde gshegs mchod rten la/ /dad pa'i sems kyis phreng ba 'dogs byed pa/ /gser phreng rin chen mang pos legs spras pa/

bsod nams las ldan de yi mgo la thogs/ /ston pa'i mchod rten dag la rgyan 'phyang 'dogs/ /de dag do shal rgyan phreng nor bu dang / /gdub bu dag dang dpung rgyan mchog rnams kyis/ /lus brgyan 'jig rten dag na rgyu bar 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar

gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /sa dang lci bas nyug pa de dag ni/ /lha dang mir skye lus mdog sdug pa dang / /rnam dag rma med bde dang ldan par 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten byi dor byas pa yis/ /shin du blta na sdug cing mig tu mdzes/ /byad bzhin

bzang zhing pad mo'i mdog dang ldan/ /sred pa'i skyon rnams dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur/ /su dag spos mchog sbyar ba'i 'bru mar gyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten nyug byed pa/ /de dag spos kyis mchod cing tsan dan gyis/ /lus byugs

nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag thub dbang mchod rten la/ /spos chu gtsang zhing dang bas khrus gsol ba/ /de dag lus la dri ma med pa dang / /gdung ba med cing mdog 'jam mya ngan med/ /su zhig sangs rgyas mchod rten sku

gzugs khang / /tshon rtsi sna tshogs dag gis mdzes byed pa/ /de ni bde gshegs mnga' ba'i yon tan rnams/ /sna tshogs ldan pa kun gyis brtsegs par 'gyur/ /su dag dpyid ka'i dus su gtsang ma'i chus/ /mchod rten nye 'khor rdul rnams

zhi byed pa/ /de la bud med rnams ni dga' bzhin du/ /rdul yab gser gyi yu ba can gyis g.yob/ /dkon mchog gsum phyir mi rnams gang dag gis/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pas ni/ /rkang lag sor mo dra bar 'brel ba dang /

yan lag thams cad kyang ni skyon med 'gyur/ /su dag dkon mchog gsum la me tog dang / /'bras bu gsar thog byung ba 'bul byed pa/ /de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /ro mchog kun thob mi rdzi stobs dang ldan/ /phreng ba rgyan chen me tog char

rnams kyis/ /su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod/ /de dag lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du/ /cha byad yid 'ong sna tshogs legs par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la dri zhim phul/ /bdug spos rgya chen mang po ldan sbyar dang / /

a ga ru yi bdug spos phul ba yis/ /de yi lus kun spos ngad ldan par 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /dga' bzhin rnga yab rnams ni 'bul byed pa/ /thugs dga' rgyal rnams snying rje rnga yab thogs/ /che ba de la cher

yang g.yob par byed/ /shin du dri med zla ba nya 'dra ba'i/ /me long sdug gu thams cad mkhyen la 'bul/ /de dag tshe rabs brgyud pa rnams su yang / /lha mi rnams kyis blta bar 'os par 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /

mchod pa'i khyad par ci yod ci 'byor pa/ /'tsham par 'bul byed de dag dri med cing / /mya ngan med pa'i bla med byang chub 'thob/ /mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs dag la mgos btud gus phyag 'tshal/ /de dag lha

rnams dang ni mi rnams kyis/ /cher yang che bar bkur ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /su zhig dad pas thub pa'i mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs dag la skor ba byed pa de/ /phyi ma'i tshe la dgra chen rnams kyis btud/ /bzang po'i snod 'gyur yon tan rnams

dang ldan/ /mi rnams su dag dga' bzhin gus pa yis/ /bla med mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la/ /lus kyi las rnams byed pa de dag ni/ /srid pa kun du mdzod rnams shin du rgyas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten rol mo'i sgra phul bas/ /zab cing rigs pa'i

spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ /yan lag lnga rdzogs yid 'ong tshig dang ldan/ /sgra skad dag gis 'jig rten 'gengs par byed/ /su dag rgyal ba'i gdung ldan stod byed pa/ /de dag gling bu'i sgra dang glu snyan dang / /sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba thob pa dang / /so so

yang dag rig pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag rtswa shing so phag gis/ /'jig rten bla ma'i spyi gab rig pas byed/ /yang na gzhan dag byed du 'jug kyang rung / /de dag 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs 'drar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag rgyal

ba'i gtsang khang byed/ /de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /lha dbang gnas 'dra'i khang khyim 'od 'bar ba/ /dus tshigs kun du bde ldan thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris las bzang 'bras bu'i gnas rnams su/ /bskal par dga' byed rtag tu dga'

bzhin du/ /rtsen par byed cing mya ngan med pa dang / /tha mar zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag 'ja' khugs 'dra ba'i rta babs mdzes/ /thub pa'i chab sgor sbreng byed de dag ni/ /srid pa gzhan du khang khyim sgo dang bcas/ /rnam par brgyan

pa rnams ni thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag ston pa'i sku gdung khang / /bsrung phyir dad pas 'obs dang sgo 'dzugs pa/ /de dag tshe rabs gzhan du dgra rnams kyis/ /dpal yon rnams dang 'bral bar yong mi nus/ /mi rnams su dag mchod rten

rnying pa rnams/ /gzhan gyi ngor byed ma yin rang gi blos/ /ral tshems byed pa'i skye bo de dag ni/ /lus bzang yon tan dam pas brgyan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rnying bsal bas/ /'dod chags chags med zhe sdang sdang mi 'gyur/

gti mug rmongs med lta ngan chags mi 'gyur/ /mi rnams rab tu dga' zhing skyid par 'gyur/ /su dag glang chen dril spyangs spa bar brgyan/ /dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta dag /ston pa dang ni 'phags pa'i tshogs la 'bul/ /de dag bla med

theg chen thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo su dag 'jig rten mgon po la/ /rin chen 'bar ba yid dang 'thad pa rnams/ /'bul ba de dag rin chen bdun po dang / /byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni gos phul bas/ /

bsod nams byas pa'i ngo tsha'i gos gyon te/ /dga' zhing yon tan kun ldan ser sna med/ /mdog kyang 'jam zhing kha dog gser 'drar 'gyur/ /dpe med mchod rten mar me phul ba yis/ /ud pal sngon po kha bye 'dra yi mig /gsal zhing sdug la

mig gi dkyus ring mdzes/ /dri ma med pa'i lha yi mig dang ldan/ /su dag mchod rten mar me dang rab 'bul/ /de dag mig tu sdug cing mdzod rab rgyas/ /mig gi dkyus ring mthon ka'i mdog dang ldan/ /skyes pa bud med dag gis blta bar 'os/ /

mtshan mo thub chen spyan sngar thal sbyar 'khod/ /'byor dang mtshan ma mar me'i sdong bu 'bul/ /de dag srid pa gzhan du 'bras bur ldan/ /rin chen rags pa'i 'od ldan lus kyang 'thob/ /rgyal la phul ba'i mar me 'chi ba na/ /dga' ba'i sems

kyis 'dir ni dga' bzhin du/ /snying po skul bar byed pa de dag ni/ /spyan lnga dag kyang nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag dge ba'i sems ldan pas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten gzhan gyis byas pa la/ /rjes su yi rang don de ma byas kyang / /

mdor na de dag gis kyang byas par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims ldan pa phyogs nas lhags pa la/ /su dag dga' bzhin mal stan sbyin byed pa'i/ /mi rnams 'gro ba dag tu 'khor ba na/ /gser gyi khri dang stan gyi mchog rnams 'thob/ /su dag rab tu byung dang

mtsham pa yi/ /kha zas bzang po dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/ /de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na/ /kha zas kha dog ro la sogs ldan 'thob/ /su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/ /btung ba rgya chen dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/ /de dag 'khor ba'i dgon

par gnas pa na/ /btung ba kha dog ro la sogs pa 'thob/ /su dag 'jig rten bla mas gsungs pa yi/ /dam chos tshul bzang thos nas nyams su len/ /de dag nyon mongs chu rlabs rab 'jigs pa'i/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho myur du rgal bar 'gyur/ /

rgyal po dge ba'i las 'di thams cad ni/ /'khor ba'i bde ba sna tshogs smin gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub dam pa yi/ /'bras bu bde blag kho nar thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po dga' mdangs ldan pa yis/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba

byas nas kyang / /thub dbang zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyal po rgyal byed tshal nas byung bar gyur/ /gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ e ka gA thA/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad

pa gcig pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med/ /'jig rten 'di na 'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na 'ang yod ma yin/ /lha'i pho brang
gnas mchog dag na 'ang yod min phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na 'ang med/ /ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas pa kun du yul zhig ga la yod/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur gA thA/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skur gyur pa ni thams cad la/ /mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis mnga' ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa'i/ /

rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang / /gang du byang chub la reg dang / /zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang / /bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang / /'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa

dang / /seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi/ /gnas de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /steng dang 'og dang bar dag dang / /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang / /sku bcas sku ni med pa yi/ /mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang gis tshigs

bcad 'di bzhi yis/ /de bzhin gshegs la bstod byed pa/ /de ni tshe rabs stong du yang / /ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa/ rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ nA ga rwa dza b+he rI gA thA/ bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal

po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab bstan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i rabs/ /thams cad legs par 'dus nas su/ /shin du dang

ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha yi lha/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ /dge slong rnams ni gcig la gcig /kha stobs la sogs rnams kyis 'gying / /dge slong tshig ngan 'don pa dag /drang srong chen pos gsan

pa na/ /de phyir thub pas dge 'dun rnams/ /bsdus nas 'di skad bka' stsal te/ /khyed cag kha stobs la sogs pas/ /gcig la gcig ni 'tshe byed pa/ /khyim nas khyim med rab byung dang / /de dag 'thun pa ma yin no/ /rtag tu yang dag

dga' byed pa'i/ /chos drug gang yin la 'jug pa/ /'di ni khyim nas khyim med par/ /rab tu byung ba rnams dang 'thun/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /'tshe ba med par ngas bsgoms nas/ /ji ltar byang chub don gnyer ba/ /

dge slong nga las 'di nyon cig /shes rab ldan pa'i mi yis 'di/ /thos nas sdig pa rnam spongs la/ /grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/ /dge ba'i chos la spyad par gyis/ /sngon gyi spun drung gyur pa yi/ /klu yi rgyal po gnyis byung ba/ /gcig gi

ming ni rnga zhes bya/ /gnyis pa nye rnga zhes bya'o/ /gnyis ka srog gcod las ldog cing / /tshul khrims ldan zhing dbang chen grags/ /klu yi skye gnas la smod cing / /mi yi srid pa 'dod par gyur/ /tshul ldan mang du thos pa yi/ /dge sbyong bram ze mthong

ba dang / /mi yi tshul du bsgyur nas ni/ /bsnyen bkur dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang / /bcu bzhi bcwa lnga gang yin pa/ /de la yan lag brgyad pa yi/ /gso sbyong la ni legs mnyam 'jog /de gnyis sngon gyi gnas spangs nas/ /

yul gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / /de dang nye ba'i gnas de na/ /rnga sgra zhes bya'i klu gnas so/ /klu yi skyes mchog spun gnyis po/ /de gnyis 'ong bar des shes nas/ /khengs shing khros pa'i yid kyis su/ /du ba can gyi dbugs 'byin cing / /khyed gnyis chos

spyod ma yin te/ /g.yon can tshul ngan mchos pa'o zhes/ /rnga sgras tshig ni rtsub mo yis/ /yang dang yang du skrod par byed/ /dman pas bskrad pa thos pa dang / /nye rnga rab tu khros gyur te/ /de tshe phu bo rnga la ni/ /tshig rnams kyis ni go byas pa/ /kye rnga mi

yi 'jig rten dag 'di na/ /tshig ngan mngon du smra bas gdung byed cing / /sbal zan chu yi 'gram na skyes pa yis/ /mche ba gdug pas bdag cag skrod par byed/ /'di ni chu nang dud 'gro rnams la 'tshe/ /thang la mi rnams la yang 'tshe bar byed/ /gtso bo

gal te bdag la bzod mchis kyang / /tshig ngan smra la yid ni bzod mi nus/ /deng ni 'di yi grong khyer dang / /pho brang gnyen 'dun bcas brlag ste/ /rnga sgra gtan nas blangs nas su/ /'di nas bdag cag 'dong bar bya/ /klu yi rgyal po stobs po che/ /de yis nu bo'i tshig thos nas/ /

yid la 'bab par byed pa yi/ /tshigs bcad 'di skad smras te bsgo/ /gang gis khyim du nyin zhag 'ga' gnas shing / /bza' dang btung ba legs par blangs gyur pa/ /de la yid kyis gnod par mi bsams ste/ /byas pa gzo ba skyes bu

dam pas bsngags/ /ljon shing gang gi grib ma yis/ /yud tsam zhig kyang legs 'gebs de'i/ /lo ma'ang bcad par mi bya na/ /yal ka ljon shing smos ci dgos/ /nags tshal shing ni bcad dam bsregs kyang rung / /slar yang skye 'gyur

'di la the tshom med/ /lag pa rlon bcad phyir yang mi skye ltar/ /grogs la 'khu bas yun ring bde mi thob/ /skye bo ngan pa yun ring mchod byas shing / /bza' btung zhim po mang pos phan btags kyang / /des ni nges par grogs po spong 'gyur

te/ /glang chen gyis ni ko'u shi'i spyil bu bzhin/ /ji ltar chu 'gram shing ni 'gyel 'gyur ltar/ /mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byed pa/ /de yi mdza' bshes brtan par mi 'gyur te/ /shing shun tshon gyis ras dkar btsos pa bzhin/ /gal te mkhas

pas dgra bo dag /mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na/ /sems la skyon ni med byas dang / /de nyid kyis ni der gnod 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang / /sa rnams bdag gi khur min gyi/ /byas pa mi gzo gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gi khur chen yin/ /mi gang

sems ni mi rgod cing / /byas pa gzo dang byas pa tshor/ /byas pa chud gzon mi byed pa/ /de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags/ /chos bde byams pa bde ba ste/ /'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bzhin/ /grogs la 'khu ba med pa dang / /nga snyems nga

rgyal zad pa bde/ /khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal che/ /sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang / /stobs ldan rnams la rgol byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig /de phyir khengs par mi bya ste/ /khro ba rnam par spang bar bya/ /khengs dang khro ba 'ongs

'gyur na/ /grags pa mtha' dag 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgan dang byis pa nad pa dang / /nyam chung thabs stor de bzhin dman pa dang / /rgyal pos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la/ /snying brtse med pa de dag mir mi rung / /rang gi yul 'khor gnas

spangs te/ /gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa na/ /tshig ngan so sor zlog pa la/ /bzod pa chen po bya dgos so/ /rang gi yul na brnyas bzhin 'dug pa bas/ /mi rnams gzhan gyi yul na gnas kyang rung / /gang na mi rnams gzhan gyis mi brnyas

te/ /rang gi yul yin de dag rang gi mi/ /mi mchog rnams ni brnyas thabs byas pa'i tshe/ /chung ma sdug dang longs spyod rgya chen gtong / /ngan pa rnams ni de na'ang yongs su 'khyam/ /brnyas thabs byas pa de yang chu bzhin 'thung / /dar ba rnyed pa dga'

ba ste/ /rgud pa mod pa yin pa'i phyir/ /sems can dmas par gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gal te nor med phyogs nyung ngam/ /mdza' bshes phyogs kyi stobs chung ngam/ /dgra bo phyogs kyi stobs ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang

bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams chos min byed pa dang / /'dod pa'i longs spyod mngon dga' zhing / /dad chung ngo tsha med pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams khro bar byed pa dang / /gnod sems mang por gyur pa dang / /gzhan la'ang gdug pa'i

tshul ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams dad pa med pa dang / /khwa bzhan mu cor smra ba dang / /sgyu dang g.yo dag byed pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / /gtum zhing gzu lums

byed pa dang / /bden pa'i chos dang mi ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams ngang tshul ngan pa dang / /log pa'i lta bas bcom pa dang / /gtum zhing sdang bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ngo tsha med cing brdzun du smra/ /don

med phra ma tshig rtsub dang / /dbyen dang khyal pa smra ba'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ya rabs tshul med shin du khengs/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'gying ba dang / /phrag dog brkam dang tshul nyams tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gang tshe mi yi rus

rnams dang / /rigs rnams shes pa ma yin pa'i/ /mi dang lhan cig 'dug pa na/ /de tshe nga rgyal byar mi rung / /gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /yul gyi phyir dang bde ba'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod

bya/ /gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /sdang bas 'khrug par gyur pa na/ /gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/ /gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /dman pas bskrad

par gyur kyang rung / /shes rab ldan pas de bzod bya/ /kye ma yul log bdag gnas shing / /mdza' bshes ngan dang phrad pa na/ /byis pa rnams dang 'grogs pa yi/ /gnas su mi ngan rten byed med/ /shes rab ldan pas de bsams

nas/ /mi shes mi dang 'grogs byed kyang / /mkhas pas nor dang longs spyod phyir/ /gzu lums kho nar khro mi bya/ /ji ltar thal bas bka' ba'i me/ /rtswa dang shing gis g.yogs pa la/ /rlung rnams kyis ni legs bus na/ /

shin du rab tu 'bar 'gyur te/ /rtswa dang shing de bsregs nas su/ /chen por mched cing 'bar ba yis/ /rtswa dang gel pa mang po dag /ljon shing chen po sreg pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam rtog bud shing las/ /byung ba'i khro ba me 'dra bas/ /

bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la/ /phung khrol chen po byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir khro ba byung ba na/ /zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/ /byams pa'i sems la bsgoms nas su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis zlog par byed/ /bstod pa byas na mdza' byed

la/ /ma bstod mdza' bar mi byed cing / /mod la yongs su spong byed pa/ /de ni byis pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /gal te 'di na byis pa dag /sgro gshog btogs pa'i bya lta bur/ /blo spangs shes rab ma 'chal na/ /

mkhas pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir byis pa phal cher ni/ /blo gros spangs shing shes 'tshal ba/ /de phyir mkhas pa shes rab can/ /khyad par du ni bde bar 'tsho/ /mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /
phongs par gyur kyang mi 'khrul 'khrug pa med/ /rjes su gzung phyir phan pa de smra na/ /legs smra yin zhes gzhan gyis cis mi rtogs/ /mkhas pa gzu lums med par gyur pa de/ /de nyid dpyad pa legs
par mnyan nas su/ /de ltar rnam par bsams nas rang don dang / /gzhan gyi don dag legs par spyod par byed/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam gyis/ /sdig pa'i las rnams kun du spyod

mi 'gyur/ /gal te bde dang sdug bsngal ldan gyur kyang / /rtag tu chos don yongs su gtong ba med/ /blo ldan g.yo sgyu can du mi 'gyur te/ /rmongs par mi 'gyur tshig rtsub khro mi 'gyur/ /phongs pa'i gnas na mya ngan mi
byed pa/ /gzhan gyis gnad la 'bebs par byed re skan/ /ha cang thal dang ha cang zhum pa yi/ /dman pa'i mi rnams la yang ma yin te/ /bar ma'i gnas la sten par byed pa dag /de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi
mtshan nyid yin/ /ha cang thal ba rtag tu 'khon/ /ha cang zhum pa rtag tu brnyas/ /de phyir de gnyis spangs nas su/ /go 'phang bar ma bsten par bya/ /res 'ga' lkugs pa'am 'on pa lta bur gyis/ /dus la

bab na sa bdag bzhin du smros/ /res 'ga' gangs ri bzhin du bsil bar gyis/ /dus la bab na me lce bzhin du spor/ /res 'ga' rtswa dang 'dra bar zhum par bya/ /dus la bab na ri rab lta bur gyis/ /res 'ga'

rgyal po lta bur 'gyur bar bya/ /dus la bab na thub 'dra nags su song / /res 'ga' bkres dang skom pa'ang bzod par bya/ /dus su bde dang sdug bsngal dang du blang / /nor phyir bran bzhin bkol par mi bya ste/ /

khro ba'i dbang du gyur par mi bya'o/ /res 'ga' dga' ba'i glu dang sil snyan gyis/ /rtse zhing sha dang chang yang spyad par bya/ /res 'ga' ri dgas lta bur 'jigs bzhin song / /dus su gcan zan bzhin du
nyams rtsal bstan/ /dang por dus dang dus min dang / /bdag nyid stobs ldan stobs med dang / /dar dang rgud pa brtags nas su/ /de nas don rnams legs par brtsam/ /bzod med rnams
la bzod pa dang / /bzod ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis/ /nyam chung rnams la'ang bzod pa dang / /stobs ldan rnams la rtag bzod kyis/ /'khon gyis 'khon zhir nams kyang mi 'gyur bas/ /bzod med rnams

la 'ang bzod par byas na legs/ /khros pa rnams la rtag tu dang ba dang / /gzhan gyi skyon rnams rtag tu bcab par gyis/ /gtso bo rnams kyi tshig ni 'jigs phyir dang / /'thab zla'i tshig dag 'thab gcugs

gyur phyir bzod/ /gang zhig 'og ma'i tshig dag bzod byed pa/ /de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas gsungs/ /gshe dang gya tsom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /blo gros chung ngu mi bzod de/ /pad

ma la ni rdo char bzhin/ /gshe dang gya tsom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /mkhas pa shin du bzod byed de/ /glang chen me tog char pa bzhin/ /khro ba dang ni brdzun dag dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /
mkhas pa shes rab ldan gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni thams cad bzod/ /rdo ba bsregs kyang 'ju mi 'gyur/ /char pa bab kyang 'jig pa med/ /de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /mkhas pa nyams
par 'gyur ba med/ /gang zhig bden pas gshe byed pa/ /de la mkhas pas bzod par byed/ /bden pa ma yin pa yang bzod/ /de las gzhan pa bstan du med/ /'di ltar skyes bu mkhas pa nor gyi phyir/ /
sdug bsngal bzod bya bzod par 'gyur bar bya/ /gal te mi bzod mya ngan rnam spangs te/ /gzhan du song na stong phrag rnyed dang 'dra/ /yal ga snyegs la 'ju bar mi bya zhing / /chags bral sems la chags
par mi bya ste/ /bzang zhing sdug pas sa steng gang bas na/ /'jig rten yangs pa gzhan du 'gror zad mod/ /gang na brnyas byed bkur sti mi byed dang / /smod par byed cing stod par mi byed na/ /mkhas
dang blun 'grogs ched ka mi che bas/ /rang rgyal bzhin du ma smra de 'gro rigs/ /gang na skyes bu 'thab la dga' gyur nas/ /g.yo sgyu'i bsam ldan rtag tu glags kyang byed/ /kyal pa dbyen brdzun tshig

rtsub smra byed pa/ /de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams 'tsho bar byed gyur nas/ /phan tshun gnod la 'bebs par dga' ba dang / /lus dang ngag yid sdom pa med gyur pa/ /de tshe mkhas pa myur du

yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams phrag dog byed gyur nas/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la rtag tu mi bzod cing / /sdang ba'i bsam pas rnam rmongs tshul 'chos pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na

mi rnams sdig byed 'dod gyur nas/ /bkur sti 'dod cing tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu byed/ /nang yang ma dag phyi yang ma dag pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams zhe sa med gyur nas/ /ya rabs

tshul med khengs shing nga rgyal ldan/ /byis pas mkhas pa rtag tu brnyas byed pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang dang gang du bza' btung dang / /gang du gos rnams rnyed pa dang / /gang du 'tsho ba der
song la/ /chags 'gyur gnas su ma 'dug cig /lan 'ga' rtsod 'gyur sred pa gang yin spongs/ /rtag khengs mchod med nga rgyal gang yin spongs/ /'bras bu ngan pa'i khro ba gang yin spongs/ /phongs dus mi
lta'i grogs po gang yin spongs/ /me yis gang ba'i lam 'dra'i ma rig spongs/ /byas gzo med pa'i gnyen 'dra'i 'dod chags spongs/ /mche ba mi bzad klu 'dra'i chags pa spongs/ /dgra bo mtshon thogs

lta bu'i sdug bsngal spongs/ /klu mo lta bu mi bzad chung ma spongs/ /mgo la me 'bar lta bu'i bu rnams thong / /'go ba'i nad bcas lta bu'i khyim rnams thong / /btung ba dug chen lta bu'i 'dod pa mthong / /

khyim gyi phyir ni gcig btang ste/ /grong khyer don du khyim btang ngo / /ljongs kyi phyir ni grong khyer te/ /bdag gi don du sa btang ngo / /mi yi yan lag phyir ni nor btang zhing / /srog gi don du yan lag btang bar bya/ /

nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog /thams cad btang gi 'dir ni chos srung ngo / /chos spyod pa la 'jigs skrag med pa nyid/ /chos spyod pa dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/ /chos spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i
'dod par 'gro/ /chos mi spyod pa shi nas gdung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /nor zad na yang blo gros mi 'khyar bar/ /'jig rten dag na ci dgar legs rgyu ba/ /sems can nang
na mi yi snying por chud/ /gang zhig dga' bas gzhan la nor sbyin zhing / /nga rgyal mche ba rnam spangs bden la gnas/ /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sems ldan de dag ni/ /dpa' bo rtul phod ya rabs thabs ldan
yin/ /gang zhig de dang de la legs bslabs pas/ /don rnams kun la mkhas par gyur pa dang / /des la 'grogs na bde ba de dag ni/ /dam pas legs pa yin zhes bsngags pa mdzad/ /nye rngas

smras pa/ rnga khyod la ni phyi phyir zhing / /'di ltar bdag ni rab tu dad/ /bdag gi lus 'di skams pa 'am/ /yang na sems ni med kyang sla/ /sdug bsngal shin du mi bzad par/ /lhung yang phyin chad sdig mi
bgyid/ /tshul khrims nyams pa gson pa bas/ /tshul khrims ldan pa shi yang sla/ /skye ba gcig tu 'di yi phyir/ /ji lta bur ni mi zad sbyang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe
gang du rab gnas shing / /de dang der ni skyes pa na/ /mi dge'i grogs dang 'grogs pa yis/ /nga yis mi dge las rnams byas/ /dge ba'i bshes dang phrad pa na/ /mi dge'i las rnams spangs par
gyur/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams mngon mkhyen nas/ /de phyir dge slong rnams la ni/ /thub pas lung yang bstan par mdzad/ /sngon tshe nga ni rngar gyur te/ /
kun dga' bo ni nye rnga yin/ /lha sbyin rnga sgrar gyur to zhes/ /skyes rabs de ltar gzung bar gyis/ /chos rnams sdud par byed pa yi/ /don rgyas mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /dge slong thams cad gus

bcas par/ /chos la spyad pa nyid du gyis/ /klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //ye d+ha mA he tu bra b+ha bA he dun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni rod+ha e ba~M` bA dI ma hA shra ma Na://
@##/ / rgya gar skad du/ u dA na bar ga / bod skad du/ ched tu brjod pa'i tshoms/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal bas ched tu brjod
gsungs pa/ /bdag gis rab tu bshad par bya/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa rnams sol la/ /yid la dga' ba bskyed de nyon/ /thams cad mkhyen pa skyob pa po/ /thub pa rjes su thugs brtse ba/ /sku yi tha ma
'dzin pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/ /de ltar rab tu
'bar ba la/ /ci zhig dgar yod mgur ci yod/ /mun pa'i nang zhugs gnas pa dag /ci phyir sgron ma tshol mi byed/ /rus pa thi ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ /bor ba gang yin 'di dag ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs su

rnam 'thor ba/ /de mthong 'di la ci zhig dga'/ /gang gi nub mo kho na nas/ /mngal du dang por 'jug pa'i mi/ /de ni sdod med 'gro 'gyur zhing / /song ba las kyang ldog pa med/ /snga dro skye bo mang mthong ba/ /

phyi dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur/ /phyi dro skye bo mang mthong ba/ /snga dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med mang po dang / /dar la bab pa'ang 'chi 'gyur na/ /de la mi 'di gzhon zhes te/ /gson pa'i rdeng
drod ci zhig yod/ /kha cig mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kha cig btsas pa'i sar/ /de bzhin kha cig 'gog tsam na/ /de bzhin kha cig yongs rgyug na/ /la la rgan dang la la gzhon/ /la la
dar la bab pa'i mi/ /rim gyis rab tu 'gro 'gyur te/ /'bras bu smin pa ltung ba bzhin/ /dper na 'bras bu smin pa rnams/ /ltung bas rtag tu 'jigs pa ltar/ /de bzhin skyes par gyur pa'i mi/ /
rtag tu 'chi bas 'jigs par 'gyur/ /dper na rdza ma'i mkhan po yis/ /'ji ba las ni snod byas pa/ /thams cad tha mar 'jig pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /dper na thags ni brkyang ba
la/ /spun ni gang dang gang bcug pa'i/ /spun gyis rting la gtugs pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /dper na nges par bsad pa dag /gom pa gang dang gang bor bas/ /bsad sa'i drung du bsnyen

pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /chu klung drag tu 'bab pa'i rgyun/ /ldog pa med pa ji lta bar/ /de bzhin mi yi tshe 'gro ba/ /slar ni ldog par 'gyur ba med/ /dka' ba nyid dang thung ba dang / /de yang
sdug bsngal ldan pa dag /myur ba kho nar 'jig 'gyur te/ /chu la dbyug gus bris pa bzhin/ /dper na phyugs rdzi dbyug thogs kyis/ /phyugs rnams gnas su phyin byed ltar/ /de bzhin nad

dang rga ba yis/ /mi rnams 'chi bdag drung du skyel/ /chu bran gyi n-i chu lta bur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo 'das pa yis/ /mi rnams tshe yang zad 'gyur zhing / /srog kyang nye bar 'jig par 'gyur/ /mel tse byed
la mtshan mo ring / /lam gyis dub la rgyang grags ring / /dam chos rnam par mi shes pa'i/ /byis pa rnams la 'khor ba ring / /bdag la bu yod de bzhin du/ /nor yod ces pas byis pa brlag /

phyi rol nang na bdag med na/ /su yi bu yin ci zhig nor/ /skyes pa bud med rnams kyi rigs/ /brgya dang stong phrag mang po dang / /longs spyod legs par bsgrubs pa yang / /'chi bdag dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing / /bslang ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /phrad pa'i mtha' ni bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pas na/ /sems can thams
cad 'chi 'gyur zhing / /dge sdig 'bras bur nyer 'gro ba'i/ /ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'brang / /sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba dang / /bsod nams byas pas bde 'gro ste/ /gzhan dag gis ni lam bsgoms pas/ /

zag med mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /gang yang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos kyang / /sku lus 'di ni spong mdzad na/ /skye bo phal pa smos ci dgos/ /gang du gnas na 'chi bas

mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/ /bar snang la med rgya mtsho'i nang na med/ /ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs na 'ang min/ /byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa/ /kun gyis lus 'di btang nas
'gro ba dang / /de kun 'jigs par mkhas pas rtogs gyis te/ /chos la gnas kyis tshangs par spyad pa spyod/ /rga ba mthong zhing nad kyis sdug bsngal dang / /sems dang bral ba'i shi ba mthong nas ni/ /

brtan pas btson ra 'dra ba'i khyim spangs kyi/ /'jig rten phal pas 'dod spang nus re skan/ /rgyal po'i shing rta shin du bkra ba'ang 'jig /de bzhin lus kyang nye bar rga bar 'gyur/ /dam pa rnams kyi chos

'di dam pa ste/ /mi mchog gzhan rtogs byed cing rga mi 'gyur/ /rga ba khyod ni blun zhing ngan/ /khyod ni mi rigs byed pa ste/ /yid tu 'ong ba'i gzugs 'di yang / /khyod kyis mngon par bcom par gyur/ /gang zhig

lo ni brgyar 'tsho ba/ /de yang 'chi bdag nyid kyis khrid/ /'di dag rga bar 'gyur ba 'am/ /yang na na ba 'ang 'chi bas 'joms/ /rtag tu ldog pa med par 'gro 'gyur zhing / /nyin dang mtshan du rab tu 'jig pa

dang / /skye dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa/ /chu tshan nang du gdungs pa'i nya dang 'dra/ /tshe 'di nyin dang mtshan mo dang / /'gro ba dang ni 'dug pa na/ /chu klung chen po'i rgyun bzhin du/ /phyir mi ldog par 'gro bar

'gyur/ /chu chung nang gi nya lta bur/ /gang zhig nyin mtshan 'da' ba yis/ /tshe 'di shin du thung 'gyur na/ /de la dga' bar byar ci yod/ /gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pa'i phyir/ /lus 'di yongs su rga ba dang / /
nad kyi tshang 'di myur 'jig cing / /snag gi tshogs kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /kye ma lus 'di mi thogs par/ /stong zhing rnam shes dang bral nas/ /dur khrod bor ba'i mgal dum ltar/ /sa yi steng du 'gyel

bar 'gyur/ /rgyun du nad kyis mngon gdung zhing / /rtag tu mi gtsang 'dzag pa dang / /rga dang 'chi bas 'tsher 'grib pa'i/ /lus 'di dor ba cir mi rung / /myur du 'jig cing na ba dang / /rnag dang ldan pa'i
lus 'di yis/ /grub dang bde ba bla med pa/ /zhi mchog don du gnyer bar gyis/ /dgun ka dang ni dpyid ka dang / /dbyar ka 'di dag bya'o zhes/ /byis pa rnam par sems byed pas/ /bar chad mthong bar
ma gyur to/ /bu dang nor phyugs 'byor pa la/ /mi yi yid ni rnam chags pa/ /'chi bdag gis ni blangs nas 'gro/ /nyal grong chu bos 'das pa bzhin/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/ /bu rnams skyabs
su mi 'gyur zhing / /pha yang ma yin gnyen 'dun min/ /khyod la skyabs su 'gyur ba med/ /'di ni bya ba byas zin don 'di bya/ /de dag byas nas bdag gis 'di bya zhes/ /de ltar mi ni yongs su
shom pa na/ /rga dang nad bcas 'chi bas mngon du bcom/ /de ltas rtag tu ting 'dzin la dga' mnyam par zhog /brtson pa skyed la skye dang rga ba'i mtha' ma ltos/ /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa mngon
par zil non la/ /dge slong dag go skye shi'i pha rol 'gro bar gyis/ /mi rtag pa'i tshoms te dang po'o// // kun rtog las ni 'dod skyes pas/ /'dod pa'i rtsa bar shes gyis te/ /khyod ni kun rtog ma
byed dang / /des na khyod la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams las mya ngan skyes/ /'dod pa rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung / /'dod pa dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /dga' ba rnams
las mya ngan skyes/ /dga' ba rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung / /dga' ba dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /'dod dga'i rnam smin sdug bsngal te/ /dang po mngar la 'bras bu tsha/ /
me sgron lag nas ma bor ba/ /mjug tu byis pa sreg byed bzhin/ /nor bu'i rna cha bu dang bu mo la/ /yongs su chags sems gang yin la ltos na/ /lcags shing gres ma las byas chings ma gang / /de dag
dam po min zhes 'phags pa gsung / /'dod pa'i ching ma gang yin de lhod kyang / /rab tu dgrol bar dka' zhes 'phags pa gsungs/ /brtan rnams 'dod pa'i bde la mi lta bar/ /de dag gtubs
nas myur du 'gro bar byed/ /'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod min gyi/ /skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin/ /'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin gnas kyang ni/ /'on kyang brtan rnams 'di la 'dun
pa 'dul/ /mi rnams la ni rtag pa'i 'dod pa med/ /'dod can gang la chags de mi rtag pas/ /yang srid med phyir sems kyis rab spongs la/ /'chi ba'i gnas mi 'gyur bar byos shes gsungs/ /'dun pa skyes

shing zad par mi byed dam/ /sems la skyon med pa dang dran pa dang / /'dod pa rnams la so sor ma chags gang / /de ni gong du 'pho ba yin zhes gsungs/ /mgar ba yis ni dngul bzhin du/ /blo gros ldan pas rim pa

bzhin/ /skad cig skad cig cung zad tsam/ /rang gi dri ma bsal bar bya/ /lham mkhan gyis ni ko ba dag /yongs su sbyangs nas lham byed ltar/ /'dod pa gang dang gang spangs pa/ /de de bde ba phun sum ldan/ /

gal te bde ba kun 'dod na/ /'dod pa thams cad yongs su spongs/ /'dod pa thams cad yongs spangs pas/ /mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /ji srid 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de srid bar du ngoms mi 'gyur/ /de las gang dag shes rab kyis/ /
ldog byed de dag tshim pa thob/ /'dod pas ngoms par mi 'gyur bas/ /shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa skyid/ /shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa'i mi/ /srid pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod la chags pa'i mi gang
yin/ /de dag kye ma chos min dga'/ /chung zad gson por 'dug pa na/ /bar chad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /blo ngan longs spyod kyis bcom pas/ /pha rol tshol bar mi byed cing / /bsam brlag 'dod la sred
pa yis/ /bdag dang gzhan yang phung bar byed/ kAr Sha pa Na'i char bab kyang / /'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa mnog chung nyes mang bar/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis khong du chud/ /lha yi 'dod
pa rnams la yang / /lhag par dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams/ /sred pa zad pas dgyes par 'gyur/ /gangs can dang ni mnyam pa yi/ /gser gyi ri bo yod gyur kyang / /
nor des gcig kyang mi tshim par/ /rtogs par gyis la legs par spyod/ /gang dag sdug bsngal de yi rgyu shes pa/ /de dag nam yang 'dod la dga' mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na zug rngu'i
rgyur shes nas/ /de dag gdul phyir brtan pa slob par byed/ /'dod pa'i tshoms te gnyis pa'o// // lus can rnams par rtog pas rab bcom pa/ /'dod chags mi bzad gtsang bar rjes lta bas/ /

'dod chags phyir zhing rab tu 'phel 'gyur te/ /rang gi 'ching ba de yis dam por byed/ /gang dag rnam rtog nye bar zhi dga' zhing / /mi sdug sgom pa rtag tu dran byed de/ /de yi sred pa rab tu spangs pa
yis/ /rang gi 'ching ba de dag rul bar byed/ /'dod pa mun nag 'dra bas g.yogs/ /sred pa'i dgab pas bkab pa dang / /bag med 'ching bas bcings pa dag /tshed mar chud pa'i nya dang 'dra/ /

skyes bu bag med rab tu spyod byed pa/ /'khri shing bzhin du sred pa 'phel 'gyur zhing / /rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/ /ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/ /mi dag dran par byed dang chags byed dang / /
yid bde ba la rtog par byed pa dag /de yis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khyams/ /tshal nang 'bras bu 'dod pa'i spre'u dang mtshungs/ /mi gang rtag tu bde ba 'dod byed pa/ /skye dang rga bar nye bar
'gro 'gyur zhing / /skye dgu sred pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar/ /rgya nang ri bong yongs su rgyug pa bzhin/ /sred pa rnams kyis mdud pa'i sems can dag /srid dang srid min dag la sems chags

shing / /kun sbyor ro la dga' ba'i by-is pa rnams/ /yang dang yang du sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo grub dang bde rnams dang bral zhing / /bdud kyi sbyor ba dag dang ldan pa de/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes

su 'gro 'gyur te/ /ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/ /'di na sred pa de 'dra spong byed pa/ /srid dang srid min dag la sred bral zhing / /dge slong srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa/ /lhag ma med par yongs su

mya ngan 'da'/ /gang zhig 'jig rten spang dka' ba'i/ /sred pa'i bud med 'dis bkol ba/ /de yi mya ngan 'phel 'gyur te/ /rtswa la char pa bab pa bzhin/ /gang zhig 'jig rten spang dka' ba'i/ /sred pa'i bud

med 'di spong ba/ /de yi mya ngan ldog 'gyur te/ /pad ma las ni chu thigs bzhin/ /de phyir ji snyed 'dir lhags pa/ /khyed la smra yis khyed bde shig /u shir phyir ni rtswa bzhin du/ /sred pa rtsar bcas drungs nas

phyung / /skyes bu sred pa dang 'grogs na/ /yun ring dus su 'khyam 'gyur bas/ /sred pa drungs nas phyung shig dang / /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /yang dang yang du nyer len cing / /yang dang yang du mngal du
'jug /gnas skabs 'gyur dang gzhan 'gyur bas/ /sems can 'ong dang 'gro bar byed/ /'dir ni spang dka'i sred pa de/ /spongs la sa bon chod cig dang / /de la sred pa med 'gyur zhing / /de ni yang du
'khor mi 'gyur/ /dal 'byor chud ni ma gzan par/ /gang gis lha dang mi rnams su/ /don gnyer bcings nas 'jog byed pa/ /yul la sred pa de las rgol/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes na yang / /dal 'byor

thal bas 'gyod par 'ong / /gang phyir srid mtsho rgyur gyur pa/ /yul la sred pa 'bras kyi gzhi/ /'khri zhing dra bas khebs byed pa/ /gdung bar byed pa ma btul na/ /sdug bsngal 'di ni yang dang yang / /rnam pa

kun du ldog mi 'gyur/ /dper na ljon shing rtsa nas ma bton na/ /bcad kyang phyir zhing skye ba kho nar zad/ /de bzhin sred pa'i phra rgyas ma bton na/ /yang dang yang du sdug bsngal 'di mi ldog /dper na bdag nyid kyis
ni byas pa'i mtshon/ /de yis rkun po'i mthu' yis bdag gsod ltar/ /de bzhin nang gi sems las byung ba yi/ /sred pas lus can nye bar gsod par byed/ /de ltar sred las sdug bsngal dag /'byung ba'i nyes

dmigs shes gyis te/ /sred spongs nye bar len med dang / /dran ldan dge slong kun du rgyus/ /sred pa'i tshoms te gsum pa'o// // bag yod 'chi med gnas yin te/ /bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas/ /bag yod 'chi

bar mi 'gyur te/ /bag med pa ni rtag tu 'chi/ /de yi khyad par de rig pas/ /mkhas pa rnams ni bag dang bcas/ /bag yod pa la rab dga' ba/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul dga' ba yin/ /de la rgyun du bsgoms pa dang / /

rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan pa'i/ /brtan pas grub bde bla med pa/ /mya ngan 'das la reg pa yin/ /gang tshe mkhas pas bag yod pas/ /bag med bcom pa de yi tshe/ /shes rab khang bzangs steng 'dzegs nas/ /

mya ngan med pas gdung bcas dang / /brtan rnams ri bo'i spo dag las/ /sa stengs byis pa rnams la blta/ /brtson 'grus dang ni bag yod dang / /yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/ /mkhas pas gling du byas nas ni/ /chu

bo chen po mngon du zlog /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dran dang ldan pa dang / /spyod pa gtsang zhing brtags nas byed pa dang / /yang dag sdom dang chos kyis 'tsho ba dang / /bag yod rnams kyi grags pa mngon par 'phel/ /lhag

pa'i sems la bag bya ste/ /thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab/ /nyer zhi rtag tu dran ldan pa'i/ /skyong ba mya ngan med pa yin/ /dman pa'i chos la mi rten cing / /bag med pa la bsten mi bya/ /log par lta la 'dod

med dang / /'jig rten 'phel bar mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pa yi yang dag lta/ /chen po su la yod gyur pa/ /de ni tshe rabs stong du yang / /ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bag med pa la sbyor byed pa/ /skye bo byis pa bsam

brlag yin/ /tshong dpon nor rnams srung ba ltar/ /mkhas pa bag dang ldan par bya/ /bag med pa la mi sbyor zhing / /'dod la dga' ba mi sogs dang / /rtag tu bag yod sems byed pa/ /zag pa zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /zag

pa zad pa ma thob kyang / /dus 'dir bag med mi bya ste/ /ri dgas ma yin seng ge ltar/ /bag med pa dag bsad par 'gyur/ /bag med pha rol bud med sten byed pa'i/ /mi gang yid la gnas skabs 'di bzhi 'byung / /bsod

nams mi 'thob bde bar mi nyal dang / /gsum pa smad 'gyur bzhi pa dmyal bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams ma thob sdig pa'i 'gro ba dang / /'jigs dang bag tsha lhan cig bde ba chung / /rgyal po'i chad pa chen pos gcod

'gyur zhing / /lus zhig sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'tshed/ /gang zhig bdag bde lta 'dod pa/ /des ni gong ma bzhin du bya/ /byis pa'i shing rta bzhin 'gyur bas/ /brtan pas brtson 'grus zhan mi bya/ /dper na byis

pa'i shing rta dag /lam chen bzang po bor nas su/ /lam ngan dag du 'gro byed pas/ /mig chag sems khongs chud pa ltar/ /de bzhin chos ni spangs nas kyang / /chos min rjesu 'jug byed pa'i/ /byis pa 'chi bdag dbang

'gro zhing / /mig chag bzhin du bcom pa thob/ /gang zhig bya ba rnam spangs nas/ /mi bya ba dag byed pa dang / /bag med pa yis rlom byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi zag pa 'phel/ /gang gis zag pa 'phel 'gyur ba/ /de yi

zag med rgyang ma na/ /gang zhig lus gtogs dran pa dag /rtag tu legs par brtsams pa dang / /bya ba ma yin mi byed cing / /rgyun du bya ba byed pa dang / /dran dang shes bzhin ldan pa de'i/ /zag pa rnams ni zad par

'gyur/ /gang gi zag pa zad gyur pa/ /des ni zag med thob par 'gyur/ /ji tsam mang du smra byed pa/ /de dag dam chos 'dzin ma yin/ /gang dag 'di na thos nyung yang / /lus kyis chos dag mngon sum byas/ /

gang dag chos la bag byed pa/ /de dag dam chos 'dzin pa yin/ /gal te rigs bcas mang du smras kyang ni/ /bag med mi dag de ltar byed mi 'gyur/ /dper na phyugs rdzis gzhan gyi phyugs bgrangs ltar/ /de dag

dge sbyong skal ba thob ma yin/ /gal te rigs bcas nyung ngu smra byed kyang / /chos kyi rjes su chos la spyod pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spong byed pa/ /de dag dge sbyong skal ba thob pa yin/ /bag yod bsngags pa rjod

byed cing / /rtag tu bag med la smod pas/ /bag yod mchod sbyin brgya pa yang / /lha rnams nang na gtso bor gyur/ /bya ba byas rung ma byas rung / /mkhas pa bag yod bsngags pa rjod/ /bag dang chas pa'i mkhas pa yis/ /

don gnyis rab tu len par byed/ /tshe 'di'i don ni gang yin dang / /phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa/ /de dag brtan pas rtogs pas na/ /mkhas pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la
'jigs lta bas/ /bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'drel te/ /'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug par byed/ /rlung
gis ljon shing lo ma bzhin/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /kun du sbyor ba phra sbom dag /me yis bsregs pa bzhin du 'gro/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /
bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /kun du sbyor ba kun zad pa/ /rim gyis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /'du byed nyer zhi zhi ba yi/ /zhi

ba'i go 'phang so sor rtogs/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta ba/ /mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/ /yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod dang / /

chos spyad legs par spyod byed pa/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /chos spyad pas ni bde ba 'thob/ /zhi phyir bslab pa la rten dang / /rtsol ba dang ni brtson 'grus skyed/ /mi dran pa dang bag med dang / /brtson 'grus chung dang kun

sdom med/ /gnyid dang snyom dang g.yeng ba ste/ /'di dag bslab pa'i bar chad pas/ /khyed kyis yan lag de rtogs la/ /dran pa chud ni ma gzan cig /dge slong tshul khrims bzang ba dang / /bag yod pa la dga' ba
yis/ /kun rtog legs par mnyam zhog ste/ /rang gi sems ni rjes su srungs/ /brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag

sde ni gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /bag yod pa'i tshoms te bzhi pa'o// //
sdug pa rnams las mya ngan skye/ /sdug pa rnams las 'jigs pa skye/ /sdug pa dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /sdug gu ma las mya ngan skye/ /sdug las sdug bsngal
sdug las 'jigs/ /sdug gu ma dag gzhan gyur na/ /yi mug 'gyur ba thob par byed/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa ji snyed pa/ /de dag sdug pa dag las

rten te 'byung / /sdug pa spangs na de dag yod mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'jig rten 'ga' na'ang sdug med pa/ /gang yin de dag bde zhing mya ngan med/ /de bas gdung med rdul bral don gnyer bas/ /nam yang sdug

par byed pa mi bya'o/ /sdug pa ma mthong sdug bsngal la/ /mi sdug mthong na'ang de bzhin pas/ /nam yang sdug dang phrad mi bya/ /mi sdug dang yang phrad mi bya/ /sdug pa dang ni bye bral dang / /mi sdug pa
dang phrad pa yis/ /gang gis mi dag rgas byed pa'i/ /mya ngan mi bzad skye bar 'gyur/ /sdug pa shi bar gyur pa na/ /gnyen 'dun mdza' bshes mang po dag /yun ring dus su mya ngan dang / /sdug dang bral
bas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /gang la sdug dang sdug min med/ /de la mdud pa yod min pas/ /de ltas sdug nyid sdig can la/ /sdug par byed pa mi bya'o/ /sdug la bltas te don btang nas/ /bde sbyor rnams
