'dir yang mya ngan gzhan du'ang mya ngan byed/ /sdig pa byas pas gnyis gas mya ngan byed/ /de ni mya ngan de rab mya ngan byed/ /bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /ring dang rgyang ring byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /
bdag gis dben par byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /de yi rnam smin yod pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rnam dag las dang ldan mthong nas/ /'di na dga' 'gyur gzhan du'ang dga' bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams
byas pas gnyi gar dga' 'gyur zhing / /de ni dga' 'gyur de rab dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis sdig pa byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing / /ring byas rgyang ring byas pas gdung bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis dben par byas

pas gdung 'gyur zhing / /de yi rnam smin yod pas gdung bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid nag po'i las dang ldan mthong nas/ /'di na gdung 'gyur pha rol gdung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa byas pas gnyi gar gdung 'gyur zhing / /
de ni gdung 'gyur de rab gdung bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing / /ring byas rgyang ring byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis dben par byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing / /de yi rnam

smin yod pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid nag po'i las dang ldan mthong nas/ /'di na dga' 'gyur pha rol dga' bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams byas pas gnyis gar dga' 'gyur zhing / /de ni dga' 'gyur de rab dga' bar
'gyur/ /sdig pa byas shing bsod nams ma byas la/ /chos dang gol zhing chos min thob pa'i mi/ /sdig pa'i las can 'chi bas 'jigs 'gyur te/ /chu chen nang du gru ngan zhig pa bzhin/ /bsod nams byas

shing sdig pa ma byas la/ /dam pa rnams kyi sngon gyi chos spyad pas/ /nga ni nams kyang 'chi bas 'jigs med de/ /brtan pa gru yis pha rol 'gro ba bzhin/ /sdig pa'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //

ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba/ /de srid srin bu me khyer snang / /nyi ma shar bar gyur pa na/ /snang ba med cing sngon por 'gyur/ /ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma shar/ /de srid rtog ge pa rnams snang / /'jig rten rdzogs sangs rgyas shar
ba/ /rtog can nyan thos bcas mi snang / /gces min gces par blos 'dzin cing / /gces la gces pa min rtog spyod yul can/ /des ni gces pa thob mi 'gyur/ /gces pa min la gces min dang / /gces la
gces par 'du shes pa/ /legs par kun rtog spyod yul can/ /des ni gces pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di na lta dang nyan la mngon zhes pa'i/ /chings ma gsar dang gsar du 'phel ba dag /'khor bar rgyug cing

'gro dang sdod 'gyur te/ /me nang lhung ba'i phye ma leb dang 'dra/ /'di la myong 'gyur gzhan la myong 'gyur ba 'am/ /'di na the tshom tha dad ji snyed pa/ /de dag tshangs par spyad spyod 'bad pa dang / /sems par byed pas rab tu rnam par

spong / /gang zhig snyigs ma yod bzhin du/ /ngur smrig gos ni gyon byed pa/ /dul dang des pa med pa de/ /ngur smrig gyon pa'i 'os ma yin/ /gang zhig snyigs ma rnams spangs nas/ /tshul khrims legs par mnyam

bzhag pa/ /dul dang des par ldan pa de/ /ngur smrig gyon pa'i 'os yin no/ /g.yo sgyu 'jungs dang ldan pa'i mi/ /kha dog dang ni gzugs ldan pa 'am/ /yang na smra bar byed tsam gyis/ /pho mchog yin par mi chud do/ /
gang zhig chos gsum de dag rnams/ /ta la'i mgo bo bzhin bcad nas/ /blo ldan skyon ni bsal ba de/ /pho mchog yin par brjod par bya/ /'jig rten 'di na legs par ma bsdams pa/ /phal cher legs bsdams
rtags kyis rgyu byed pas/ /legs par ma brtags bar du mi dag gi/ mdog gzugs lan 'ga' mthong bas yid ma rton/ /ra gan kha bsgyur lta bur mi 'tsham zhing / /lcags phyed gser gyis g.yogs pa ji lta bur/ /

khong pa rab gdug phyi rol 'phags tshul gyis/ /'jig rten 'di na 'khor dang bcas par rgyu/ /gang zhig rde 'gengs gnyid ni log pa dang / /nyin dang mtshan du 'gre ldog nyal byed pa/ /rdzab nang phag chen lus rgyas ji

lta bar/ /yang dang yang du smad pa'i mngal du 'jug /mi ni rtag tu dran pa ldan pa dang / /rtag tu kha zas kyi ni tshod shes pa/ /de yi sdug bsngal chung bar 'gyur ba dang / /dal bus 'ju bas tshe yang ring bar byed/ /gang zhig

dbang po ma bsdams shing / /zas kyi tshod ni mi shes la/ /dran pa nyams dang le lo can/ /gtsang bar lta zhing gnas byed pa/ /de ni 'dod chags rnams kyis bcom/ /rlung gis mi brtan ljon shing bzhin/ /gang zhig

dbang po legs bsdams shing / /zas kyi tshod ni shes pa dang / /so sor dran zhing brtson 'grus ldan/ /mi gtsang lta bas gnas byed pa/ /de ni 'dod chags kyis mi choms/ /rlung gis ri bo mi g.yos bzhin/ /

dgon pa dga' bar bya 'os pa/ /de la skye bo mi dga' yang / /de la 'dod chags bral ba dga'/ /'dod pa tshol bar byed rnams min/ /dgon pa 'am yang na grong dag gam/ /gshong ngam thang bu dag kyang rung / /gang na

'phags pa bzhugs pa yi/ /sa de yid tu 'ong ba yin/ /dam pa ring nas snang gyur te/ /gangs can gyi ni ri bo bzhin/ /ngan pa nye yang mi snang ste/ /mun khrod mda' ni 'phangs pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa don sems
byed pa yi/ /dam pa nyid dang 'grogs na ni/ /don chen 'gyur zhing zab mo yi/ /shes rab so sor rtogs par 'gyur/ /gzhu yis mda' 'phangs bsnun pa yi/ /g.yul ngo'i glang chen ji bzhin du/ /tshul 'chal

skye bo mang po yis/ /mi snyan smras pa bzod par bya/ /mi gang khyim 'bigs byed pa dang / /dad pa med cing byas mi gzo/ /go skabs bcom dang skyugs pa za/ /de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ /pha ma dag ni bsad byas

shing / /rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang / /yul 'khor 'khor dang bcas bcom na/ /mi ni dag par 'gyur zhes bya/ /gang dag kun du sogs med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /

dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun du sogs med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod

yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun du sogs med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /

de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun du sogs med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni

rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun du sogs med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka'

ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun du sogs med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni

bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes

bzhin/ /gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /

gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /

gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /

gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /

gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /

skye dgu phal pa 'di dag ni/ /pha mtha' nyid tu rgyug byed pas/ /gang dag pha rol 'gro byed pa'i/ /mi yi skye bo de dag nyung / /gang dag legs par gsungs pa yi/ /chos la chos kyi rjes lta bas/ /skye bo de dag skye shi yi/ /mtsho

chen rgal dka'i pha rol 'gro/ /skyob pa rab tu rnam grol zhing / /dus 'das mya ngan bral ba dang / /mdud pa thams cad spangs pa la/ /yongs su gdung ba yod mi 'gyur/ /'jigs dang bcas pa'i lam rgal cing / /g.yang

sa yongs su spangs pa dang / /sbyor dang mdud pa las grol bas/ /'dod chags kyi ni dug kun bcom/ /'dod pa lta bu'i 'dam rdzab med/ /zhe sdang lta bu'i gnod med do/ /gti mug lta bu'i rgya med de/ /sred pa lta bu'i chu klung med/ /

nam mkha' la ni rjes lta bur/ /phyi rol pa la dge sbyong med/ /byis pa spros la mngon par dga'/ /de bzhin gshegs la spros mi mnga'/ /sbyor bas byis pa khrid pa'i phyir/ /mkhas pa sbyor ba 'joms par byed/ /

mkhas pa lha dang mi dag gi/ sbyor ba gang yin 'joms byed pa/ /sbyor ba kun dang bral ba'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba las ni srid pa byung / /sbyor ba med pas srid pa zad/ /srid pa dang ni srid

med pa'i/ /lam 'di gnyis ni shes gyis la/ /sbyor las rab tu 'da' bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pas de la bslab par gyis/ /nyes par spyad pa byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing / /ngan 'gror song ba'i 'og tu'ang gdung bar 'gyur/ /

legs par spyad pa byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing / /bde 'gror song ba'i 'og tu 'ang dga' bar 'gyur/ /phyi nas gdung 'gyur de byed pas/ /gnyis na nyes spyad ma byas bla/ /gdung bar mi 'gyur de bya ste/ /legs par

spyad pa byas na rung / /mkhas dang byis pa 'dres pa las/ /ma smras shes par mi 'gyur bas/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang smros shig dang / /smras pa yis ni shes par 'gyur/ /legs bshad drang srong rgyal mtshan to/ /

drang srong rgyal mtshan chos yin pas/ /chos ni bshad pas gsal bya zhing / /drang srong rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar gyis/ /ma smras na yang smod byed cing / /mang du smras na smod par byed/ /dal bus smras kyang smod byed de/ /

'jig rten na ni mi smad med/ /gcig tu smad par bya ba dang / /gcig tu bstod par bya ba'i mi/ /da ltar yod pa ma yin te/ /'byung bar ma gyur 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gang dag la ni gnas pa'i spros med cing / /gang dag kun sbyor gdung

las rab log pa/ /thub pa sred bral de dag rgyu mdzad kyang / /lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams kyis mi shes so/ /gang gis dad dang tshul khrims dang / /blo la phan ni ma byung bar/ /ji lta ji ltar rtogs gyur pa'i/ /shes pa can

dag stod byed de/ /de dag sus kyang smad 'os min/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi gser rgyan bzhin/ /ji ltar ri dang brag dag ni/ /rlung gis g.yos par mi 'gyur ltar/ /de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ /mkhas pa rab tu g.yo ba med/ /

sa la gang gi rtswa med pa/ /lo med lcug phran ga la yod/ /'ching ba las grol brtan pa de'i/ /ji ga sus kyang smad 'os min/ /gang zhig rgyal las mi nyams shing / /'jig rten ma rgyal chung zad med/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas

de/ /'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/ /gang zhig rgyal las mi nyams shing / /'jig rten ma rgyal chung zad med/ /sangs rgyas mthu rtsal mtha' yas de/ /'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/ /gang la 'khrid byed srid pa ni/ /

yul sred 'dra ba dga' med pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas de/ /'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/ /gang la 'khrid byed srid pa ni/ /yul srid dra ba dga' med pa/ /sangs rgyas mthu rtsal mtha' yas de/ /'gro med gom

pa gang gis bkri/ /gang zhig rnam par rtog pa rnam bsal cing / /nang gi kun la rnam par rtog med pa/ /kun du sbyor dang gzugs dang 'du shes 'das/ /rnal 'byor bzhi dang bral ba skye ba med/ /sngon bral phyi ma dang bral

zhing / /dbus bral srid pa'i pha rol phyin/ /rnam pa kun las sems grol ba/ /skye rga phyi ma 'dren mi 'gyur/ /phrugs kyi tshoms te nyi shu dgu pa'o// // rgyal ba las ni 'khon byung zhing / /pha rol pham pa sdug

bsngal 'thob/ /rgyal dang pha rol pham spangs na/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba 'thob/ /gzhan la sdug bsngal bskyed pa yis/ /gang zhig bdag ni bde 'dod pa/ /dgra dang mi 'bral 'grogs pa dang / /de ni sdug bsngal las mi

'grol/ /bde ba 'dod phyir 'byung po la/ /gang zhig 'tshe zhing chad pas gcod/ /bdag gi bde ba 'dod pa de/ /pha rol du ni bde mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig bde ba 'dod pa dag /'byung po la ni mi 'tshe zhing / /chad pas mi gcod

bde 'dod pa/ /de dag pha rol bde ba 'thob/ /chos spyod legs par spyad bya zhing / /nyes par spyad pa de mi spyod/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /chos spyad pas ni bde ba 'thob/ /chos la legs spyod bde

skyed pas/ /chos spyod chos kyis bsrung bar bya/ /chos spyod ngan 'gror mi 'gro ba/ /chos la legs spyod phan yod de'o/ /yangs pa'i gdugs kyis dbyar ka ltar/ /chos spyod chos kyis bsrung bar bya/ /chos spyod

ngan 'gror mi 'gro ba/ /chos la legs spyod phan yod de'o/ /bag med mi yis chos min spyad na ni/ /'gro ba gang yang rung ba ngan 'gror 'gro/ /'di na sbrul nag rked nas bzung ba ltar/ /chos min spyod pa de dag rlag
par 'gyur/ /chos dang chos min gnyis ga yi/ /rnam smin 'dra bar mi 'gyur te/ /chos ma yin pas dmyal bar 'gro/ /chos kyis bde 'gro thob par byed/ /sbyin pa byed pa'i dus dang g.yul 'gyed dus/ /rgyu
yis yongs su bzung bar 'dra bas na/ /sbyin pa byed dang g.yul 'gyed 'dra zhes gsungs/ /yon tan de gnyis mi ngan rten mi byed/ /shin du legs par chas pa gcig pus kyang / /legs par ma chas 'phyes

las rgyal byed ltar/ /gal te dad pa bskyed na chung ngu byin pas kyang / /des ni de dag gzhan du bde bar 'gyur/ /'di na lan brgyar g.yul zlog dpa' bo bas/ /ser sna dgrar gyur zil gyis mnan nas su/ /gang zhig
chags med sems kyis sbyin byed pa/ /de dag ches dpa' yin par ngas gsungs so/ /bsod nams rnam smin bde ba ste/ /mngon par bsams pa 'byor bar byed/ /myur du zhi ba dam pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob par
'gyur/ /bsod nams byed pa rnams la ni/ /gzhan las byung ba'i gnod pa dang / /lha dang bdud kyi ris rnams kyis/ /bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /gal te sdug bsngal zad bya'i phyir/ /'phags dang shes rab
gtong ldan la/ /de yis 'bad rtsol byas na ni/ /lhag mthong gis ni reg par 'gyur/ /sems ni rab tu rnam dang bas/ /chos la dga' byed bde ba 'thob/ /'phags pas gsungs pa'i chos dag la/ /mkhas pa

rtag tu dga' bar byed/ /gang dag sems ni bsam gtan dga'/ /gang zhig skye med dga' ba dang / /dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhi dang / /byang chub yan lag bdun dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi rnams dang / /

yan lag brgyad lam gang dga' ba/ /de dag chos gos 'chang ba dang / /bsod snyoms bde bar za bar byed/ /de dag ri dang nags tshal na/ /bde bar 'chag par byed pa dang / /de dag bde 'thob bde bar ni/ /mthong ba'i

chos la mya ngan 'da'/ /'khon dang 'jigs pa kun 'das shing / /'jig rten yul gyi srid las rgal/ /chos thos pa dang mthong ba dang / /dben par dga' ba bde ba ste/ /'jig rten srog chags 'byung po la/ /'tshe med

yang dag sdom pa bde/ /'dod pa rnams las rab 'das shing / /'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba bde/ /nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag /btul ba de dag mchog tu bde/ /rgas khar tshul khrims ldan pa bde/ /dad la rab tu

gnas pa bde/ /don ldan tshig la dga' ba bde/ /sdig pa mi byed pa dag bde/ /'jig rten na ni phar 'dzin bde/ /de bzhin mar yang 'dzin pa bde/ /'jig rten dge sbyong 'dzin pa bde/ /de bzhin bram zer 'dzin

pa bde/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde/ /de bzhin chos rnams bstan pa bde/ /dge 'dun rnams ni 'thun pa bde/ /'thun pa rnams kyi dka' thub bde/ /tshul khrims ldan pa mthong ba bde/ /mang du thos pa

mthong ba bde/ /yang srid rnam par grol ba yi/ /dgra bcom pa dag mthong ba bde/ /'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bde/ /chos kyis rgyal ba'i skye bo bde/ /shes rab thob par gyur pa bde/ /nga 'o nga rgyal zad

pa bde/ /'phags pa rnams ni mthong ba bde/ /dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa bde/ /byis pa rnams ni ma mthong na/ /rtag tu bde ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun du dgra 'dra ba'i/ /byis dang 'grogs pa sdug bsngal

zhing / /byis pa dag dang 'grogs byed pa/ /yun ring rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur/ /skyes bu cang shes dkon pa ste/ /de dag kun du 'byung ma yin/ /brtan pa rnams dang 'grogs pa dag /gnyen dang phrad pa lta bur bde/ /

gang du brtan pa de skyes pa/ /de yi rigs kyis bde ba 'thob/ /bram ze mya ngan 'das pa dag /rnam pa kun du bde bar 'jug /gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos shing / /zag med rab tu rnam grol ba/ /sred pa thams cad

gtubs pa dag /snying las rims nad rnam par bsal/ /sems kyis zhi ba thob pa rnams/ /nye bar zhi zhing bde bar 'jug /gang zhig bde ba yangs 'dod cing / /bde ba chung ngu gtong 'dod pa'i/ /brtan pas bde chung

spang byas na/ /bde ba yangs pa legs par mthong / /'jig rten 'dod bde gang yin dang / /lha yul bde ba gang yin pas/ /sred pa zad pa'i bde ba de'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /khur gyis sdug bsngal blangs pas

na/ /khur bor na ni bde bar 'gyur/ /lci ba'i khur dag nges bor na/ /phyi nas gzhan dag len mi 'gyur/ /kun sbyor thams cad zad pa'i phyir/ /sred pa thams cad rab tu spongs/ /phung po thams cad yongs shes na/ /
srid pa phyi mar 'gro ba med/ /don rnams bskrun pa la ni grogs ldan bde/ /srog dag rab tu gtugs la bsod nams bde/ /ngan ngon tsam gyis legs par chog shes bde/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nges par nub

pa bde/ /'di na me ni 'bar ba la/ /lcags kyi tho bas brgyab pa yis/ /rim gyis nye bar zhi 'gyur te/ /ji ltar song ba mi shes ltar/ /'dod pa'i 'dam rdzab chu rgal cing / /go 'phang mi g.yo thob pa dang / /

legs par rnam par grol rnams kyi/ /'gro ba gdags su med pa yin/ /gang zhig khong na 'khrug pa med pa dang / /gang zhig sred dang sred min las log pa/ /de dag 'jigs bral bde zhing mya ngan med/ /lhas kyang

blta zhing bsam du med par 'gyur/ /'di na gang dag chos mang thos pa dang / /rtogs shing ci yang med pa kye re bde/ /skye bo skye bo'i lus la rab chags shing / /chung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /'di

na gang dag chos mang thos pa dang / /rtogs shing ci yang med pa kye re bde/ /skye bo skye bo'i lus la rab chags shing / /chung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /skye bo ci med yon tan rtogs pa dang / /skye bo ci

yang med par gyur pa bde/ /skye bo skye bo'i sems la rab chags shing / /chung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /skye bo ci med yon tan rtogs pa dang / /skye bo ci yang med par gyur pa bde/ /skye bo skye bo'i lus la rab

chags shing / /chung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /gzhan gyi dbang gyur kun sdug ste/ /rang dbang yod pa thams cad bde/ /sbyor ba shin du spang dka' ba/ /thun mong gyur pas brlag par zad/ /zhen par gyur pa'i

mi nang na/ /zhen pa med par gnas pa dang / /zhen pa'i nang na ma zhen pa/ /kye ma'o shin du bde bar 'tsho/ /nad kyis thebs pa'i mi nang na/ /nad med par ni gnas pa dang / /nad pa'i nang na nad med pa/ /kye ma'o shin

du bde bar 'tsho/ /'tshe ba can gyi mi nang na/ /'tshe ba med par gnas pa dang / /'tshe ba'i nang na 'tshe med pa/ /kye ma'o shin du bde bar 'tsho/ /gnod sems can gyi mi nang na/ /gnod sems med par gnas

pa dang / /gnod sems can nang gnod med pa/ /kye ma'o shin du bde bar 'tsho/ /sha khon can gyi mi nang na/ /sha khon med par gnas pa dang / /sha khon can nang 'khon med pa/ /kye ma'o shin du bde bar 'tsho/ /

mi thi la dag rab bsregs kyang / /nga la ci yang tshig pa med/ /nga la gang dag ci med pas/ /kye ma'o shin du bde bar 'tsho/ /nga la ci yang med mod kyi/ /dga' ba za bar byed pas na/ /'od gsal gyi ni lha bzhin

du/ /kye ma'o shin du bde bar 'tsho/ /'jig tshogs la ni mi rten pas/ /nga la ci yang med mod kyis/ /dga' ba za bar byed pas na/ /kye ma'o shin du bde bar 'tsho/ /len pa'i rkyen gyis phrad cing reg 'gyur gyi/ /

len med ci dang phrad cing reg med pas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i bde sdug gis/ /dgon pa 'am grong du reg par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten 'di na bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /skyes bu dam pa mtho dman mi 'gyur

zhing / /brtan rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu yis mi 'khyal bar/ /skyes bu dam pa kun du 'gro bar byed/ /bde ba'i tshoms te sum bcu pa'o// // ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/ bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ gzung bar dka'

zhing yang ba dang / /gang du dga' bar 'gro ba yi/ /sems dul ba ni legs pa ste/ /sems dul ba yis bde ba 'dren/ /bdud kyi gzhi dag spong ba ni/ /chu bo'i gnas nas rab bton te/ /thang la bor ba'i nya lta
bur/ /bdag gi sems ni yongs su g.yo/ /nyi ma las ni 'od zer ltar/ /bdag gi sems ni so sor rgyug /de dag mkhas pas nges bzlog ste/ /lcags kyu yis ni glang chen bzhin/ /nga la don med spyod pa

dang / /bltar med snying po med pa de/ /rtag tu gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sems de la ni nga smra'o/ /sems 'di sngon chad ji ltar 'dod pa dang / /dga' dgur spyod cing rgyu bar byed pa dag /glang chen myos la mi yis lcags kyu

ltar/ /de ni tshul bzhin bya bas de bzung ngo / /khang khyim byed pa 'di yis ni/ /yang yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal can/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba du ma zhig /da ltar phan cad khyod kyi phyung / /khang khyim byed pa khyod mthong bas/ /

khyim gyi gdung chen rnam bcom la/ /phyam rnams thams cad bcag nas su/ /phyin cad khyim byed mi gzhug go/ /sems ni 'du byed dang bral nas/ /'di nyid la ni zad par 'dod/ /sems ni g.yo zhing brdzun pa ste/ /ring du 'gro zhing bzlog dka' ba/ /mda'

mkhan me yis srong ba ltar/ /yid gzhungs pa yis bsrang bar bya/ /gang zhig lus med phug na gnas/ /gcig pu rgyu zhing ring 'gro ba'i/ /sems de 'dul bar byed pa ni/ /'jigs pa che las thar bar 'gyur/ /log pa'i smon ldan sems gang gis/ /

bdag nyid sdug bsngal byed 'gyur ba'i/ /de ltar 'khon gyis 'khon can dang / /dgra bos dgra la byed mi 'gyur/ /yang dag smon ldan sems gang gis/ /bdag nyid bde bar byed 'gyur ba/ /de ltar pha dang ma dag dang / /gnyen gzhan gyis

kyang byed mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'jag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /'dod chags rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /

de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /'dod chags rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /zhe sdang rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /

ji ltar khang steng g.yog legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgom pa'i sems/ /zhe sdang rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma

bsgoms pa/ /gti mug rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag par/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /gti mug rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog nyes na/ /

char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /nga rgyal rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /nga rgyal
rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog nyes pa/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /chags pa rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog
legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /chags pa rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems
ni ma bsgoms pa/ /sred pa rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yog legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /sred pa rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /
chos kyi sngon du yid 'gro ste/ /yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin/ /gal te yid rab gdug pa yis/ /smras sam yang na byas kyang rung / /de yis de ni sdug bsngal 'thob/ /'khor los mgo bo bcad pa bzhin/ /

chos kyi sngon du yid 'gro ste/ /yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin/ /gal te yid rab dang ba yis/ /smras sam yang na byas kyang rung / /de yis de ni bde ba 'thob/ /grib ma rjes su 'brang ba bzhin/ /bcad pa ched
cher 'dzin pa dang / /sems ni nyon mongs gyur pa yis/ /glags skabs tshol bar byed pa yis/ /legs bshad legs par mi shes so/ /sdang ba'am yang na 'khrug pa 'am/ /dad pa med pa'i
sems dag gis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yi/ /dam chos kun shes mi nus so/ /gang gis bag med sems dang ni/ /khro ba rnam par btul ba dang / /'di na gnod sems rab spangs pa/ /
des ni legs par bshad pa shes/ /sems kyi brtan pa med pa yis/ /dam chos rnam par shes mi 'gyur/ /dad pa 'gyur ldog byed pa yi/ /shes rab yongs su rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /kun rtog la chums

rten pa yi/ /lta ngan sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ chu bo'i rgyun ni gang yin pa/ /yid kyi rgyun las rab tu 'bab/ /dga' sems dang po phal pa dang / /sems kyi rjes 'brang zhan pa yi/ /mi de'i grags 'grib 'bras
lhags pa'i/ /ljon shing la ni bya bzhin no/ /sems khyod phung khrol 'dod la dga' ma byed/ /brtson sems bag yod pa la gnas par gyis/ /bag med byas pas dmyal bar btsos pa na/ /lcags gong mid

pas khyod ni ma ngu shig /ldang ba'i dus tshe 'dug par byed pa dang / /lang tsho stobs ldan mi 'bad khyim 'dug dang / /bsam pa rdzogs tshe le lo byed pa yi/ /mi yi shes rab lam rtogs mi 'gyur ro/ /phran tshegs rnam

rtogs zhib mor rnam rtog pas/ /nang na gnas pa'i yid ni g.yen yang spyo/ /yid kyi rnam rtog de dag ma shes na/ /'khrul sems yang dang yang du rgyug par byed/ /gang zhig dran ldan rnam 'byed brtson pa dang / /

rnam par rtog la mkhas pas de shes na/ /nang na gnas pa'i yid ni g.yen spyo ba/ /thams cad ma lus blo yis rab tu spong / /lus 'di bum pa 'dra bar rtogs byas shing / /grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs

nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /'jig rten 'di dag bum pa 'drar rtogs shing / /de bzhin chos rnams smi rgyu 'drar shes nas/ /shes rab mtshon

gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /lus 'di dbu ba 'dra bar rtogs byas shing / /grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul
sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /'jig rten 'di dag dbu ba 'drar rtogs shing / /grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis dgra dang g.yul sprad de/ /
btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /gang gis byang chub yan lag bdun/ /sems kyis legs par bsgoms pa dang / /gang zhig len la mi dga' zhing / /len pa rab tu spangs pa dang / /zag

zad skyon rnams bsal ba de/ /'jig rten dag na mya ngan 'das/ /gang zhig g.yag rnga'i rtse mo ltar/ /rang gi sems ni rjes srung zhing / /'byung po rnams la brtser ldan pa/ /de yi bde ba yongs mi nyams/ /

gang phyir glang po'i glang po che/ /mche ba bzang po'i glang chen dang / /sems dang sems ni mnyam pas na/ /de phyir gcig pu nags su dgyes/ /gang gi yid la gnod med cing / /'byung po kun la brtse ba dang / /
'byung po rnams la byams byed pa/ /de la nams kyang 'khon mi 'byung / /gang la gnod pa'i sems med cing / /'byung po kun la brtse ba dang / /srog chags kun la byams byed pa/ /de la nams kyang 'khon mi
'byung / /gang la gnod pa'i sems med cing / /'byung po rnams la brtse ba dang / /sems can kun la byams byed pa/ /de la nams kyang 'khon mi 'gyur/ /mdza' bshes kun dang grogs kun dang / /'byung po kun
la brtse ba dang / /byams pa'i sems ni bsgom byas na/ /bde ba shin du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gal te gang zhig srog chags 'ga' la'ang sdang med sems/ /byams par byed na de yis de ni dge ba yin/ /sems
can thams cad la ni yid kyis brtse byas na/ /bsod nams phal chen 'phags pas rab tu bsgrubs par 'gyur/ /mi gang dga' ba'i sems dang ni/ /zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis su/ /dge ba'i chos la sgom

byed pa/ /grub pa dang ni bde ba 'thob/ /yang dag shes pas rnam grol zhing / /skyob pa nye bar zhi gyur pa/ /de yi yid ni zhi gyur cing / /lus dang ngag gi las kyang zhi/ /ji ltar rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /

chos rnams legs par mthong ba ltar/ /sil snyan yan lag lnga pas kyang / /de ltar dga' bar byed mi 'gyur/ /gang yid ting 'dzin la dga' ba/ /de dag 'dod pas rtse mi byed/ /gang zhig cung zad gdung med pa'i/ /

skyob pa bde bar nyal bar 'gyur/ /gang yid ting 'dzin la dga' ba/ /de dag 'dod pas rtsen mi byed/ /gang zhig cung zad gdung med pa'i/ /thub pa kye ma'o dga' bar 'gyur/ /gang gi sems ni brag lta bur/ /
rab tu g.yo ba med 'dug pa/ /chags pa'i gnas la mi chags te/ /khro ba'i gnas la 'khrug med par/ /gang yid de ltar gyur pa de/ /sdug bsngal thob par ga la 'gyur/ /skur pa mi gdab gnod mi bya/ /
so sor thar pas bsdam par bya/ /zas kyi tshod kyang shes par bya/ /bas mtha' dgon par gnas bya zhing / /lhag pa'i sems la rnal 'byor bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ /sems kyi rtags la mkhas

pa dang / /rab tu dben pa'i ro rnyed dang / /rab dran sems pa'i 'grus skyong can/ /zang zing med pa'i dga' ba myong / /gang zhig yid gzhungs dben dga' dben gnas pas/ /rtag tu rang gi lus kyis spyad lam

dang / /smra dang yid ni srung bar byed pa de/ /mya ngan spong zhing sdug bsngal 'thob mi 'gyur/ /ma bsrungs pa yi sems dang ni/ /log par lta bas bcom pa dang / /gnyid dang rmugs pas zil non pa/ /bdud kyi
dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bas sems ni bsrung byas te/ /yang dag lta bas mdun bdar cing / /yang dag kun rtog spyod yul can/ /yang dag skye dang 'jig pa shes/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa zil gnon
pa'i/ /dge slong sdug bsngal zad pa 'thob/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag /gcig tu sems can dmyal bar 'tshed/ /
bag yod sems ni bsrung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag /gcig tu dud 'gro rnams su 'tshed/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul
yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag /gcig tu yi dgas rnams su 'tshed/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems ni bsrungs ba dag /
gcig tu mi yi nang du dga'/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems ni bsrungs ba dag /gcig tu mtho ris rnams su dga'/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /
sems dul yang dag sdam pa bde/ /skye dgu sems ni bsrungs ba dag /gcig tu mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /sems kyi tshoms te sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa bdag rang tsam/ /

'drangs par byed kyi gzhan dag mi gso ba/ /rtag tu nyer zhi dran dang ldan pa yi/ /skyob pa de la lha rnams dga' bar byed/ /dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa bdag rang tsam/ /'drangs par byed kyi gzhan dag mi gso ba/ /

skyob pa de la lha rnams dga' byed kyi/ /bkur sti nor dang grags 'dod rnams la min/ /dge slong 'dod pa kun spangs shing / /mdun na gnas pa'i rdul bsal ba/ /bdag med thub pa brtan pa yis/ /gzhan la smra

bar bya mi dgos/ /skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa/ /mi bzad rjod pa'i tshig de thos gyur kyang / /dge slong sdang sems bral la ji mi snyam/ /g.yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin/ /skye bo ma
bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa/ /mi bzad rjod pa'i tshig de thos gyur kyang / /dge slong yid legs bzhag la ji mi snyam/ /g.yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin/ /bzo yis mi 'tsho yang zhing

bdag la dga'/ /dbang po dul zhing kun las rnam grol zhing / /khyim la ma chags bag med 'dod sred spangs/ /gcig pu spyod byed de ni dge slong yin/ /'tsho gtsang snyom las med pa yi/ /grogs po 'thun pa bsten bya zhing / /
so sor bgo bsha' bya ba dang / /spyod yul cho ga mkhas par bya/ /lag pa legs bsdams rkang pa legs bsdams dang / /tshig rnams legs bsdams dbang po legs bsdams shing / /gcig pu nang du mnyam par
'jog la dga'/ /chog shes de ni dge slong yin zhes gsung / /dge slong chos la kun dga' zhing / /chos dga' chos la sems pa dang / /chos la rjes su dran pa dag /chos las yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/ /

dge slong khang stong zhugs nas su/ /nang la lta bar byed pa dang / /chos rnams legs par mthong ba dag /lha yi dga' dang ldan par 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar phung po la/ /skye dang 'jig par legs rtogs pa/ /

de lta de ltar de yis ni/ /dga' dang mgu ba nyid kyang 'thob/ /dge slong dga' ba mang po yis/ /sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong

'dod chags dag /zad pa kun du rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong zhe sdang dag /zad pa kun du rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis

rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong gti mug dag /zad pa kun du rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong nga rgyal dag /zad pa kun du rab mi g.yo/ /
ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong chags pa dag /zad pa kun du rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong
sred pa dag /zad pa kun du rab mi g.yo/ /gang la kun du sogs med cing / /gang la bdag gir byed med pa/ /gang dag med na'ang mi gdung ba/ /de ni dge slong zhes brjod do/ /re shig gzhan la slong ba

tsam/ /ji ga dge slong min pa snyam/ /grong ba'i chos ni 'dzin byed pa/ /ji ga dge slong min pa snyam/ /gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dag /rab spangs tshangs par spyod ldan zhing / /sde tshogs spangs nas spyod byed pa/ /

de ni dge slong zhes brjod do/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang ba/ /des ni blta bas mi ngoms pa'i/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas

shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang des/ /'du byed nyer zhi zhi ba yi/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang ba/ /des ni kun sbyor kun zad pa/ /
rim gyis mngon sum byed par 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang bas/ /bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'dren te/ /'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin/ /dge slong gang

zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang bas/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug byed de/ /rlung gis ljon shing lo ma bzhin/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang
bas/ /mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/ /yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/ /sems dga' yid ni bzang ba dang / /dga' dang mi dga' zil gnon pa'i/ /dge slong dga' ba mang po yis/ /sdug bsngal
zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /lus zhi ngag ni zhi ba dang / /sems zhi legs par mnyam bzhag cing / /'jig rten zang zing spangs pa yi/ /dge slong nyer zhi yin zhes brjod/ /ting 'dzin med la shes rab
med/ /shes rab med la ting 'dzin med/ /shes rab ting 'dzin ldan pa de/ /dge slong yin zhes brjod par bya/ /de bas ting 'dzin shes rab la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis 'jug bya ste/ /de bzhin shes rab
dge slong de'i/ /dang por bya ba 'di yin no/ /chog shes dbang po bsdam bya zhing / /so sor thar pas bsdam par bya/ /zas kyi tshod kyang shes par bya/ /bas mtha' dgon par gnas bya zhing / /lhag
pa'i sems la rnal 'byor bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ /gang gi lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med gyur pa/ /de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims can/ /ngo tsha'i yid ldan dge slong yin/ /
gang gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ /phyogs kyi chos bdun legs bsgom pa/ /de ni dge ba'i chos can de/ /mnyam bzhag dge slong yin zhes gsung / /'di na gang zhig bdag nyid kyi/ /sdug bsngal
zad pa rab shes la/ /dge zhing shes rab ldan pa de/ /zag med dge slong min zhes gsung / /zag pa zad pa ma thob na/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs tsam dag gam/ /yang na thos pa mang po 'am/ /

dben pa dag tu gnas kyang rung / /ting 'dzin thob par gyur kyang ngal/ /rdeng drod chod pa'i dge slong min/ /phung po la ni bdag zer ba'i/ /'jig rten 'di dag gdung ba ste/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba ni/ /
'phags pas bsten pa mngon du bya/ /ji lta ji ltar bsam byas pa/ /de lta de ltar gzhan du 'gyur/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /srid pa la chags srid pa dga'/ /srid la mngon chags
la lta/ /srid pa nyid la mngon par dga'/ /dga' bya gang yin de sdug bsngal/ /skyi g.ya' gang yin de bde bas/ /srid pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ /'di na tshangs par spyod pa sten/ /dge sbyong bram ze
ji snyed pa/ /srid pas srid las nges 'byung zer/ /de dag thams cad srid pa las/ /nges 'byung min zhes brjod par bya/ /dge sbyong bram ze ji snyed pa/ /srid pas srid las nges 'byung zer/ /
de dag thams cad srid pa las/ /rnam grol min zhes brjod par bya/ /len pa'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal byung / /sdug bsngal las ni len pa byung / /len pa thams cad yongs zad na/ /sdug bsngal rab tu
'byung ba med/ /len pa thams cad na srid pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no zhes de ltar de dag la yang dge ba'i
shes rab kyis ji ltar bzhin du mthong na/ srid pa'i sred pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur zhing / srid pa med pas mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong skyob pa ni gzhan

du len pa med cing yang srid med par 'gyur te/ bdud zil gyis non pa dang / g.yul las rgyal ba dang / srid pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa 'di lta bu 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /dge slong dngos

po bcad pa dang / /nye bar zhi zhing sems zhi ba/ /de ni yang srid med par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /nye bar zhi zhing sems zhi ba/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching
las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /sems ni zag pa med gyur pa/ /de ni yang srid med pa ste/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos
po bcad pa dang / /sems ni zag pa med gyur pa/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /srid pa'i sred pa gtubs gyur pa/ /
de ni yang srid med par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /srid pa'i sred pa bcad gyur pa/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par
spangs/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma bkrugs pa dang / /'dod chags zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing / /

grong gi tsher ma bkrugs pa dang / /zhe sdang zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma bkrugs pa dang / /gti mug zad pa rjes thob
pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma bkrugs pa dang / /nga rgyal zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dab
rdzab legs rgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma bkrugs pa dang / /chags pa zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dab rdzab legs rgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma bkrugs pa dang / /

sred pa zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig gshe ba dang ni gsod pa dang / /'ching dang grong gi tsher ma thul ba dang / /gang zhig ri bo bzhin gnas mi bkri zhing / /sdug bdes ma g.yos

de ni dge slong yin/ /skur pa mi 'debs sgro 'dogs mi byed cing / /'jig rten 'di kun brdzun rtogs dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug

btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /'dod chags langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /zhe sdang langs

pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /gti mug langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /

de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /nga rgyal langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste

sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /chags pa langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /

sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /khro ba langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /sred

pa langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /'dod chags ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong

gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /zhe sdang ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol

po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /gti mug ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje

ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /nga rgyal ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i

rags la klung chen ltar/ /chags pa ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /sred pa ma

lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad spong byed cing / /'dod sbyor 'ching ba rnam bsal dge slong gang / /

de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs shing sdig med pa/ /yid gnyis zug rngu bcad pa'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /

spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /rtog pa rnam bsal nang gi ma lus la/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /

nags sbyor byed pa 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /rtsa ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /rims nad bcas pa 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /

rtsa ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /bag la nyal ba 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /rtse ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha

rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas lpags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /khrims ldan gang yin dge slong de/ /stong nyid gang ldan bsam gtan de/ /rtag tu byed gang rnal 'byor de/ /mya ngan 'das gang bde ba de/ /dge slong dga'

dang mi dgas mi brjod cing / /bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu sten pa dang / /de ni bag yod gnas shing sred pa yi/ /'dod chags phra rgyas legs par 'byin par byed/ /dge slong gi tshoms te sum bcu gnyis pa'o// //

gang zhig brgyan kyang chos spyod dul ba dang / /zhi zhing yang dag sdom la tshangs par spyod/ /'byung po kun la chad pas mi gcod de/ /bram ze dge sbyong de yin dge slong de/ /gcer bus spyod pas ma yin rol pas

ma yin rdzab kyis min/ /kha zas mi za ba yis ma yin thang la nyal ba 'am/ /rdul dang dri mas ma yin cog pur 'dug la 'bad pa yis/ /mi rnams dag par mi 'gyur som nyi rnams las rgal mi 'gyur/ /dge sbyong

bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /zag pa zad pa ma thob par/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /tshor ba zad pa ma thob par/ /

bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed cing / /byis pa mtha' gcig la lta ba/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid

la chags byed pa/ /byis pa'i skye bo blo ngan rnams/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /go 'phang dam pa ma thob par/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /

blo ngan khyod kyi ral pa ci/ /khyod kyi g.yang gzhi gyon pa ci/ /khyod nang thibs por 'dug bzhin du/ /phyi rol legs par byi dor byed/ /blo ngan khyod kyi ral pa ci/ /khyod kyi g.yang gzhi gyon pa ci/ /khyod nang dri ma ldan bzhin
du/ /phyi rol legs par byi dor byed/ /rigs kyis bram zer 'gyur ma yin/ /ral pas ma yin rus kyis min/ /gang zhig bden pa'i chos ldan pa/ /gtsang ma de yin bram ze yin/ /rigs kyis bram zer
'gyur ma yin/ /ral pas ma yin rus kyis min/ /gang zhig sdig pa tshad chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag /sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de/ /bram ze yin zhes nges par brjod/ /
mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/ /o ma zhes zer ba bram zer min/ /gang zhig dge ba'i chos ldan pa/ /gtsang ma de yin bram ze de/ /mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/ /o ma zhes zer ba bram ze min/ /

gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag /sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de/ /dge sbyong bram ze de yin no/ /skye bo phal cher 'dir 'khru ba/ /chu yis dag par mi 'gyur te/ /gang zhig

sdig pa che chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag /sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de/ /dge sbyong bram ze de yin no/ /gang zhig sde chos rab spangs shing / /rtag tu dran ldan spyod byed pa/ /kun sbyor zad pa'i sangs

rgyas de/ /'jig rten dag na bram ze yin/ /bram ze gang zhig sdig pa'i chos spangs shing / /bdag nyid tshul 'chos med cing rnyog med gnas/ /rig byed mthar phyin tshangs par spyod pa spyad/ /dus su smra byed de ni

tshangs pa smra/ /gang zhig rgyu la mi gnas nga rgyal med/ /gang zhig chags med bdag med re ba med/ /'khrug bcom bdag nyid mya ngan 'das phyogs de/ /bram ze dge sbyong de yin dge slong de/ /gang zhig ma yi mngal skyes

nas/ /gal te 'dzin pa dang bcas nas/ /de ming b+hu zhes smra bar bstan/ /bram ze yin par nga mi smra/ /yongs su 'dzin med len med de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid

kyis nyis byas mi byed cing / /gang zhig gnas gsum legs bsdams te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gi tshig ngag mi rtsub cing / /go byed yid 'ong smra ba dang / /gang gis nyon mongs mi skyed de/ /bram ze

yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig gsod 'ching gshe ba dang / /sdang ba min la bzod byed de/ /bzod pa'i btul zhugs stobs tshogs can/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /khro ba med cing tshul khrims can/ /
brtul zhugs ldan zhing sems khral med/ /dul zhing lus mthar gnas pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig rab byung khyim pa dang / /de bzhin gnyis gar

mi 'dre zhing / /'dod chung khyim nas ma byung de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /ma 'ongs pa la mngon mi dga'/ /'das pa rnams la gdung med pa/ /'khrig pa'i sbyor bral g.yul rgyal de/ /bram ze yin par

ngas gsungs so/ /ma 'ongs pa la mngon mi dga'/ /'das la gdung med rdul bral zhing / /zhi ba mya ngan med pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'dod chung gzhan mi gso/ /dul zhing snying por rab

gnas la/ /zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig pha rol tshu rol dang / /pha rol tshu rol gnyis med cing / /chos rnams kun gyi mthar phyin de/ /bram ze yin par ngas

gsungs so/ /gang zhig pha rol tshu rol dang / /pha rol tshu rol gnyis med cing / /gang zhig gnas gsum ma chags de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig thung dang ring ba dang / /phra sbom dge dang mi dge dang / /

'jig rten cung zad mi len de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'di nyid rab shes shing / /rang gi sdug bsngal zad pa dang / /'dod chags bral zhing mi ldan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /
gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dang / /gnyi ga yis kyang mi gos pa/ /gos med rdul bral zhi ba de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig dge dang sdig pa'i las/ /chags gang yin de rab 'das shing / /
chags las rab 'das rnam grol de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sngon dang phyin ma dang / /dbus kyang yod pa ma yin pa/ /rdul bral 'ching ba las grol te/ /bram ze yin par ngas

gsungs so/ /pad ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /gang zhig sdig pa mi gnas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /pad ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /

gang zhig 'dod la mi gnas te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /pad ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /srid la dga' ba yongs spangs de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /

zla ba dag cing dri med la/ /skyon bral rab tu dang ba ltar/ /gang zhig sdig pas mi gos de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /skyon bral rab tu dang ba ltar/ /gang zhig 'dod pas mi gos de/ /bram ze yin par

ngas gsungs so/ /zla ba dag cing dri med la/ /skyon bral rab tu dang ba ltar/ /srid la dga' ba yongs spangs de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /

gang zhig sdig pas mi gos de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /gang zhig 'dod pas mi gos de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab

kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /srid la dga' ba yongs spangs de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'dug nas rdul bral ba/ /sems shing zag zad bya ba byas/ /dul zhing
lus mthar gnas pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /shes rab zab cing yid gzhungs la/ /lam dang lam min rnams la mkhas/ /gang zhig don mchog rjes thob de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /

mi ni gang yang rung ba dag /slongs mo tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / /bdag med su la 'ang gnod mi byed/ /brtan ldan tshangs par spyod pa can/ /kun shes spyad phyir chos ston de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig
'dod pa legs spangs shing / /khyim med par ni rab byung ste/ /'dod pa'i zag pa yongs zad de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'byung po chad pas mi gcod cing / /bsod

med bsod tu mi 'jug de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig mi mthun 'thun byed cing / /chad pas gcod pa dang du len/ /'byung po rnams la brtse phan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /smyung bu'i

rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal 'chab pa 'joms pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sred pa'i rdzong 'di dang / /'khor ba'i klung las rab rgal cing / /rgal nas pha

rol 'gro bar sems/ /yid nyid kyis ni mi bkri zhing / /gang zhig len pa las log de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dang ni/ /pha rol na yang sred med cing / /srid pa'i sred pa yongs
zad de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dang ni/ /pha rol la yangs chags med cing / /chags med rnam par bral ba de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /dga' dang mi dga'

spangs pa dang / /bsil bar gyur cing zag pa med/ /'jig rten kun zil gnon brtan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /mi yi sbyor ba spangs nas su/ /lha yi sbyor ba rab 'das shing / /sbyor ba kun dang rnam

bral de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lha dang dri za dang / /mi yi 'gro ba mi shes shing / /zhi ba 'gro ba mi shes de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis chos rnams mi shes pa 'am/ /

ma mthong ba ni med gyur la/ /shes bya mtha' yas lta ba de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis sngon gyi gnas rtogs shing / /mtho ris ngan song mthong ba dang / /de nas skye ba zad thob pa'i/ /thub pa

mngon shes la brtson pa/ /sdug bsngal tha mar rab shes de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /sems kyi rnam grol shes pa dang / /'dod chags kun las grol ba dang / /rig pa gsum dang ldan pa de/ /bram ze

yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis sems can 'chi 'pho dang / /skye ba thams cad rtogs gyur pa/ /thogs med spyan ldan sangs rgyas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig kun sbyor kun 'das shing /

yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / /dga' med dran ldan ston pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /thub pa rnam rgyal drang srong che/ /khyu mchog rab mchog glang po che/ /bkur med khrus byas sangs rgyas de/ /
bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig srid 'das kun zil gnon/ /chu bo las rgal rnam par 'dren/ /rnam bral pha rol phyin pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /sdig can rnam par mi sems

shing / /mi sgom smra bar mi byed par/ /'dug nas rdul bral sems pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig phyag dar khrod 'chang zhing / /ngo tsha shes shing 'dod mi lta/ /shing drung dag tu gnas pa de/ /
bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spangs phyir/ /zhi ba 'phags lam yan lag brgyad/ /drang po sgom par byed pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang la chung zad gnas med
cing / /'du shes yid gnyis zug rngu med/ /'chi med go 'phang thob pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lus med phug na gnas/ /gcig pu rgyu zhing ring du 'gro/ /gdul bar dka' ba'i sems
'dul de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig gzugs med bltar med mtha' yas la/ /shin du bltar med phra zhing gzhi mngon rtogs/ /rtag dran kun sbyor zad rgyu sangs rgyas pa/ /'jig rten
'di na de ni bram ze yin/ /gang gis sogs mig 'ching gtubs te/ /chings ma rgyang thag bcad nas su/ /yongs su gdung spangs sangs rgyas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis rnyed 'dod sdig

can dang / /sog mig chings ma gtubs gyur cing / /sred pa rtsar bcas drungs phyung de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /brtson pas chu bo'i rgyun bcad cing / /'dod pa thams cad rab bcom dang / /'du byed rnams

kyi zad shes pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang / /yul 'khor 'khor dang bcas bcom pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /pha dang ma ni bsad

byas shing / /rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang / /mi bzad pa yi stag bsad pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /gang zhig bram ze rdeg pa blun/ /skrod par byed pa de ngan pas/ /bram ze rnams la brdeg mi bya/ /

bram ze bskrad par mi bya'o/ /gang zhig chos rnams rnam shes na/ /rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung / /de la bkur zhing phyag bya ste/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig chos rnams rnam shes na/ /rgan
nam yang na gzhon yang rung / /de la bkur zhing bsnyen bkur te/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam shes na/ /de la bkur zhing
phyag bya ste/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam shes na/ /de la bkur zhing bsnyen bkur te/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /

gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe sha za ba ku la/ /gcig po las kyang shin du 'das/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe des mthong tshor

ba rnams/ /thams cad nub pa nyid tu 'gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe de yis mthong bas na/ /rkyen rnams thams cad nub par gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe de yis mthong

bas na/ /kun sbyor thams cad nub par gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyis/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe skye dang rga ba dang / /'chi ba rnams las shin du 'das/ /nyin mo nyi ma gsol bar byed/ /mtshan mo zla ba snang ba ltar/ /rgyal rigs go chas chas pa gsal/

bram ze sems par byed na gsal/ /nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/ /mtshan mo zla ba snang byed ltar/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas gzi brjid can/ /nyin dang mtshan du gsal bar byed/ /ji ltar mi sdug pa las yid ldog pa/ /de 'dra bram ze rnams la cung zad med/ /ji lta ji ltar

de yi yid ldog pa/ /de lta de ltar kun rdzob bden par zad/ /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis chos rnams rgyur bcas rab shes pa/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang

gis sdug bsngal rgyur bcas rab shes pa/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis tshor ba zad pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi

ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas 'bad pa na/ /gang gis rkyen rnams zad pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis zag pa zad pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /

chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /ji ltar mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ltar/ /'jig rten thams cad snang byed 'dug 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang

tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /blo yis kun sbyor rnams las rab grol te/ /bdud sde rnam par bsal nas 'dug 'gyur la/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bram ze'i tshoms te sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //sdom la/ de bzhin gshegs dang thos

dang bdag /bsgre dang mdza' bshes lnga pa'o/ /mya ngan 'das dang mthong ba dang / /sdig dang phrugs dang bden pa dang / /sems dang dge slong tshoms dag dang / /bram ze yang ni tha ma yin/ /ched du brjod pa'i tshoms

dgra bcom pa chos skyob kyis bsdus pa/ /rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya pra b+ha ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ /
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sad dzA na pu ru Sha sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag

lnga po 'di dag ni skyes bu dam pa'i sbyin pa dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na dge slong dag skyes bu dam pa ni dad pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin/ gus par byas te rang gi lag pa nas dang / dus su gzhan dag la mi gnod par

sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin no/ /dge slong dag dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'dod bya ba gang zhe na/ dad pas sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin/ nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba yin/

nor gyi yo byad mang ba yin/ bdag dbang ba'i slong che ba yin/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / mdzod dang / bde ba'i tshogs mang ba yin/ bran dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba yin

mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin te/ dge slong dag dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnams par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gus par byas te/ sbyin pa

byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin pa'i bar snga ma bzhin

no/ /bu dang / chung ma dag dang bran dang / bran mo dang las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang mdza' bo dang / blon po dang nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang / /gus par byas par 'gyur ba yin te/ dge slong dag

gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa byin

pas phyug por gyur pa nas mdza' bo dang / blon po dang nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de'i khyim gyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la yang sems 'jug pa yin/ zas kyi longs

spyod rgya chen po dag dang / theg pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang / mal cha'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rgya chen dag la yang sems 'jug pa yin no/ /dge

slong dag rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag dus su sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ dus su sbyin pa byin pas

phyug por 'gyur ba yin pa nas/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang po'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de'i nor dag kyang dus su thob pa dang / mang zhing 'thun pa mngon du 'byung ba yin te/ dge

slong dag dus su sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ gzhan la mi

gnod par sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin pa nas mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de'i longs spyod gang dag brtson 'grus brtsams
pas thob pa lags/ mthus bsgrubs pa rngul zhing dri ma chags chags su bsgrubs pa/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyis thob pa de dag la yang rgyal po 'am/ rkun po 'am/ me 'am/ chu 'am/ mi 'dza' ba bgo skal

la spyod pa 'am/ gang las kyang bar chad mi 'byung ba yin te/ gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di la 'dod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas 'di ltar ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dad cing gus par byas te rang gi lag pa nas/ /dus su gnod pa med par mkhas pa sbyin pa byed/ /

sbyin pa rgya che ba dang chen po 'dir byin nas/ /kun bged byed pa de ni bzang 'gror 'gro ba yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// //d+harma shud d+ho pa ri pri ts+tsha'o/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de bzang skyong gis bsgyur/ ban de dpal

brtsegs kyis zhu chen bgyis/ she/ d+harma shud d+ho ba ri pri ts+tsha'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ nan da pra pra dz+yA sU tra/ bod skad du/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas kyi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs banabs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas phyi

bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dga'
bos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom
ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag
'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba yin no/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu sel ba

yin no/ /'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sgyu dang / g.yo'i mun pas bsdus pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin no/ /lo tog thams cad kyi sa gzhi lta bur yon tan thams
cad kyi gzhi yin no/ /rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /bde ba thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu yin no/ /yon tan thams cad kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin no/ /sems can thams cad dbugs
'byin pa yin no/ /'byung po thams cad kyi yid brtan pa yin no/ /srog chags thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin no/ /sems can dbul po thams cad kyi bum pa yin no/ /skyabs med pa rnams kyi dpung
gnyen yin no/ /kun du tshol bas phongs pa dang sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag pa rnams kyi bsti sa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi mchod par
bya ba yin no/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no/ /thar par 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin no/ /sems can dag pa rnams kyi bsnyen par bya ba yin no/ /snod du gyur pa rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin
no/ /ngan song gi sgo gcod pa yin no/ /mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo 'byed pa yin no/ /lha'i 'gro ba rnams kun du 'gengs pa yin no/ /sdug bsngal thams cad kun du gcod pa yin no/ /sred pa'i 'ching bas

bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba'i khyim yin no/ /thar pa'i yang dag par sdom pa yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa la bsnyen pa

yin no/ /rgyun nye bar gcod pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa rnams sreg pa yin no/ /phra rgyas rnams 'byin pa yin no/ /lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba rnams 'jig par byed pa yin no/ /bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba yin no/ /

bzod pa smra ba sgreng ba yin no/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par byed pa yin no/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa yin no/ /nu zho'i rgya mtsho skems pa yin no/ /rus pa'i ri 'jig par byed pa yin no/ /

skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' yin no/ /phung po'i khur 'joms pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin pa yin no/ /khyim gyi gzeb du bcings pa rnams rnam par grol
bar byed pa yin no/ /gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad par byed pa yin no/ /the tshom rnams dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma brtan por gyur pa rnams gcod pa yin no/ /rga shis 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa
yin no/ /sdug pa dang bral ba zad par byed pa yin no/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses pa rnams kyi bde ba dang mi 'jigs pa'i 'gram yin no/ /'dod pa'i khams las rgal bar byed pa yin no/ /gzugs
kyi khams las yang dag par rgal bar byed pa yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams las rnam par rgal bar byed pa yin no/ /don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob par byed pa yin te/ /dga' bo de

ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi mig lta bu yin no/ /gti mug gi mun pa'i sgron ma yin no/ /rgyud dag par byed pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/ /
lam stor ba rnams la lam kun du ston pa yin no/ /chos thams cad kyi de kho na ston pa yin no/ /mdud pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba yin no/ /

mi shes pa'i rab rib kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa rnams 'dral bar byed pa yin no/ /le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la rtsom par byed pa yin no/ /tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa yin no/ /tshul khrims
phun sum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams mchog du dga' ba yin no/ /nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams rab tu dga' ba yin no/ /

rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mchog tu chog shes par byed pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms par byed pa rnams kyi mtshon cha yin no/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams mchog tu rgyal bar byed pa yin no/ /gnas med pa
rnams kyi gnas so/ /skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyob pa yin no/ /'jigs pas 'brel pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs par byed pa yin no/ /skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyi bde ba'i yo
byad yin no/ /'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/ /lha dang mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas pa yin no/ /mi'i dbang po rnams
kyis mchod pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no/ /khyim gyi gnas yongs su gtong ba yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam 'dren pa yin no/ /skra'i khur 'dreg pa yin no/ /gos ngur

smrig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin no/ /rigs pa la brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no/ /'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin no/ /bdud sdig to can rnams kyi grags pa 'joms pa yin no/ /

lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu yin na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags par bde

ba yin na dga' bo gzhan yang dal ba thob pa ni bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang shin du rnyed par dka' ba yin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas kyang ches rnyed par dka' ba yin no/ /dga' bo thar par 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang

srong rnams dang / gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa rnams kyang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sa bor nas rab tu byung ngo / /de bzhin du khyim bdag dang / bram ze'i tshogs
gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams bor nas rab tu byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni khyim par mchis la sbyin pa dag stsal/ bsod nams dag

bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang bsgrub par
bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khams gsum pa gang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar gyur la/ rigs kyi bu

'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las lo brgyar 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na dga' bo de ni byung bar nges par 'byung ba'i

sems kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/ /dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / /dal ba shin du rnyed dka' ste/ /dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ /nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig /dga' bo dper na sa chen po 'di chu gcig pur rgyu

mtshor gyur la/ de na ru sbal zhar ba gcig kyang yod/ de na gnya' shing bu ga gcig pa gcig kyang rgyu la ru sbal zhar ba de 'di skad du/ gnya' shing gi bu ga der mgrin pa chud par bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing / gnya' shing

bu ga can de yang rlung gis bskyod nas phyogs phyogs su rgyug par byed pa na dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig gis ru sbal zhar ba de'i mgrin pa gnya' shing gi bu ga der 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo mi nyid thob pa ni ma yin no/ /dal ba phun

sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /dga' bo khyod kyis mi nyid shin du rnyed par dka' ba dang / de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / /dal ba shin du rnyed dka' rnyed/ /dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur

na/ /nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig /dper na 'ga' zhig gis khab kyi mig gnam du bstan te yungs kar gyi 'bru rnams 'thor bar byed na dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig gis der yungs kar gyi 'bru gang yin pa gcig chud par 'gyur gyi/

dga' bo mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma yin no/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /dga' bo mi nyid shin du rnyed par dka' ba dang / de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / /dal ba

shin du rnyed dka' rnyed/ /dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ /nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskal pa bye ba stong dang ni/ /brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang / /sangs rgyas sgra ni mi thos na/ /sangs

rgyas mthong ba ga la zhig /u dum ba ra'i me tog ni/ /shing las shin du rnyed dka' ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste/ khyed kyis nga ni rnyed gyur na/ /dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / /dal ba shin du rnyed

dka' ste/ /dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ /nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig /de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par dad pa kho nas khyim nas

khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo

rdzogs s+ho// // rtsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas zhus chen bgyis pa/ /@#/ / rgya gar skad du/ de ba ta sU tra/ bod skad du/ lha'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig

na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na lha mdog bzang po zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas lha de'i mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe lha des
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /mtshon cha rnon po de gang lags/ /ha la ha la'i dug gang lags/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i me gang lags/ /mun pa rab gnag de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

tshig dug mtshon cha rnon po yin/ /'dod chags ha la ha la'i dug /zhe sdang rab tu 'bar ba'i me/ /mun pa rab gnag ma rig pa/ /lhas gsol pa/ mi yis zin pa de gang lags/ /gang 'dir bor ba de gang lags/ /
mi shigs go cha ci zhig lags/ /'di na mtshon du ci rno lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis gang byin zin pa yin/ /khyim du gang bzhag 'dir bor yin/ /mi shigs go cha bzod pa yin/ /
'di na mtshon du shes rab rno/ /lhas gsol pa/ chom rkun zhes bgyi de gang lags/ /dam pa rnams kyi nor gang lags/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /bslus shes bgyi ba gang dag lags/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam rtog chom rkun mkhas pa yin/ /tshul khrims dam pa rnams kyi nor/ /gang dag tshul khrims log lhung byas/ /de dag 'jig rten bslus pa yin/ /lhas gsol pa/
bde zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ /dbang phyug dam pa de gang lags/ /rtag tu rnam par rgyan pa gang / /mtho brtsams gang lags bka' stsal gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chung
bde bar shes par bya/ /chog shes dbang phyug dam pa yin/ /khrims ldan rtag tu rnam par brgyan/ /tshul khrims nyams pa mtho brtsams yin/ lhas gsol pa/ rtsa lag mnyes gshin de gang lags/ /
bsam pa sdang ba'i dgra gang lags/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad de gang lags/ /mchog tu bde ba de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa lag mnyes gshin bsod nams yin/ /
sdig pa bsam pa sdang ba'i dgra/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /phung po med pa'i bde ba'i mchog /lhas gsol pa/ sdug la mi phan de gang lags/ /phan yang mi sdug gang zhig lags/ /
gnod pa bgyid pa'i nad gang lags/ /sman pa'i mchog gcig de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod pa sdug kyang mi phan pa/ /thar pa phan la mi sdug pa/ /'dod chags gnod
pa med pa'i nad/ /sman pa'i mchog gcig sangs rgyas yin/ /lhas gsol pa/ gang gis 'jig rten 'di bsgribs lags/ /gang gis 'jig rten dbang du bgyis/ /gang gis mdza' bshes 'byed par bgyid/ /
gang gis mtho ris mchi mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pas ni 'jig rten bsgribs/ /gti mug gis ni dbang du byas/ /zhen pas mdza' bshes 'byed par byed/ /chags pas
mtho ris 'gro mi 'gyur/ /lhas gsol pa/ gang gis mdza' bshes 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang gis dgra rnams zhi bar bgyid/ /gang gis mtho ris 'thob par bgyid/ /gang gis thar par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtong bas mdza' bshes 'phel bar 'gyur/ /byams pas dgra rnams zhi bar byed/ /tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris thob/ /shes pas thar par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
lhas gsol pa/ rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/ /shin du bsgrim pa bgyis gyur na/ /skyes pa 'am bud med gang gi 'ang rung / /dbrog par mi tshugs ci zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/ /shin du bsgrim pa byas gyur kyang / /skyes pa 'am bud med gang gi 'ang rung / /dbrog par mi tshugs tshul khrims so/ /lhas gsol pa/ 'jig rten 'di ni gang gis 'ching / /
gang gis 'jig rten rnam par grol/ /gang zhig rnam par spangs pas na/ /mya ngan 'das shes bgyi bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod pas 'jig rten 'ching bar byed/ /'dod pa
med pas rnam par grol/ /sred pa rnam par spangs pas na/ /mya ngan 'das shes brjod pa yin/ /lhas gsol pa/ rlung dmar gyis kyang mi shigs shing / /zhugs kyis mi 'tshig de ci lags/ /dog sa gtam
par bgyid pa yi/ /chab kyis mi 'drul ci zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlung dmar gyis kyang mi shes shing / /mes kyang mi 'tshig bsod nams yin/ /sa rnams khebs par byed pa
yi/ /chus kyang mi 'drul bsod nams so/ /lhas gsol pa/ su zhig shin du bslus gyur nas/ /'jig rten 'di nas pha rol mchis/ /da dung bdag gi dogs pa 'di/ /khyod kyis bsal bar mdzad
pa'i rigs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang gis longs spyod yod bzhin du/ /bsod nams bsags pa ma byas pa/ /de ni shin du bslus gyur nas/ /'jig rten 'di nas pha rol song / /lhas
gsol pa/ 'jigs pa kun las 'das gyur cing / /rgal ba'i 'jig rten mthu ldan pa'i/ /bram ze mya ngan yongs 'das par/ /kye ma bdag gis ring nas mthong / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal nas lha de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rjes su yi rangs te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /lha'i mdo rdzogs so// //
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ alpa de ba ta sU tra/ bod skad du/ lha'i mdo nyung ngu / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas lha zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha des bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/ tshul khrims gang lags spyod pa gang / /yon tan gang lags las gang gis/ /

gnas pa ji ltar shes rab gang / /skye bo gang dag mtho ris mchi/ /lha la thugs brtse nyer bzung nas/ /ston pas de la lung bstan pa/ /skye bo mtho ris gang 'gro ba/ /lha khyod nga la rab tu nyon/ /srog gcod pa las

phyir ldog cing / /khrims bzung yang dag sdom la dga'/ /gang dag 'byung po mi 'tshe ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /gang dag ma byin len spong zhing / /sbyin pa gtong la rtag dga' ste/ /rku ba spong zhing mi rku ba/ /

skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad mi 'gro/ /log par g.yem pa rnam par spong / /bdag gi chung mas chog sems pa/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /gzhan gyi don la rku bya dang / /bdag gi phyir

dang 'jigs pa'i phyir/ /brdzun gyi tshig rnams mi smra ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /grogs po rtag par 'byed byed pa/ /phra ma'i tshig rnams rab spong zhing / /gang dag 'dun par rab dga' ba/ /skye bo de dag

mtho ris 'gro/ /rgyags la sten cing zhe gcod pa/ /tshig rtsub dag ni rnam sbyong zhing / /'jam po'i tshig tu gang smra ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /don med gnas dang ldan pa yi/ /kyal pa'i tshig rnams rab

spong zhing / /gang yang dus su chos smra ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /grong ngam 'on te dgon pa na/ /gzhan gyis bdag gir byas pa la/ /de la chags sems gang med pa/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /byams
pa'i sems kyis mi 'tshe zhing / /gnod par sems pa med pa yis/ /skye bo kun la mi gnod pa/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /las dang las kyi rnam smin dang / /gnyis ga la yang gang dad cing / /

yang dag lta ba yang dag 'dzin/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /dge ba'i chos rnams 'di dag ni/ /dkar po chos kyi lam bcu ste/ /gang dag yang dag 'dzin 'gyur ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ /bram ze mya ngan

'das pa dang / /dgra dang 'jigs pa kun 'das shing / /'jig rten chags med rgal ba ni/ /mang po yod par ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /lha'i mdo nyung ngu rdzogs so// // zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsan+d+ra sU tra/

zla ba'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa can na 'gro ba po'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po

sgra gcan gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'od kyis bkab par gyur to/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de skrag cing dngangs la mi dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ kun las rnam par rab grol ba'i/ /
sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gnod pa dag dang phrad gyur pa/ /bdag gi skyabs ni mdzad par gsol/ /'jig rten dgra bcom bde gshegs la/ /zla ba skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ /sangs rgyas 'jig
rten thugs brtse rnams/ /zla ba thar mdzod sgra gcan las/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sgra gcan zla ba mun sel ba/ /nam mkha' dag la 'od byed cing / /lam mer 'dug la dkar ba dang /

rnam par dag pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /bar snang dag la ma bzung bar/ /skye dgu'i sgron de myur du thong / /de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan de/ /lus kyang rngul cing skrag gyur la/ /nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/ /

zla ba rnam par gtong bar byed/ /de nas rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan rings pa bas kyang rings par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor btong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de'i tshe tshigs su

bcad de smras pa/ ci yi phyir na sgra gcan khyod/ /lus kyang rngul cing skrag gyur la/ /nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/ /rings par zla ba gtong bar byed/ /sgra gcan gyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshigs bcad 'di
brjod pas/ /gal te zla ba ma btang na/ /bdag gi mgo bo tshal bdun 'gas/ /gson yang bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos smras pa/ kye ma bden pa gzigs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas

rnams ni 'byung ba rmad/ /de dag gis ni tshigs su bcad/ /brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gtong / /zla ba'i mdo rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ kU TA gAr sU tra/ bod skad du/ khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo/
thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom
ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag dar bgyis pas dge ba'i rtsa ba cir 'gyur lags/ dkyil 'khor bgyis pas cir 'gyur lags/ skyabs su

'chi ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyi dge bas ni cir 'gyur lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba'i sug las kyis ni cir 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'khor bar
bas par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la bas ma 'tshal ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bgyis pas ni cir 'gyur lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyag dar byas pa'i phan yon ni lngar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ bdag gi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /
